descriptions.en:
Spawns a <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.1% to 1.33%. Average of 83.5 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 4.25x
• Exotic <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 5.05x
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 1.05x

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

While Charging a Grenade:
Chaotic Exchanger grants 20% Damage Resist.

Grenade Hits proc Chaotic Exchange, granting <:pve:922884406073507930>2000% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1000%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 1.75 seconds.
4 second cooldown between Activations.

Charged Vortex Grenade can proc twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你蓄力手雷时：
获得 20% 的伤害抗性。

手雷命中会触发混沌交易，为你提供 <:pve:922884406073507930>2000% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1000%] 额外基础手榴弹充能速率 1.75 秒。
触发冷却时间 4 秒。

如果敌人被蓄力漩涡手雷的初始爆炸和最后几次伤害命中，则可以触发两次混沌交易。

descriptions.en:
On Class Ability Usage with 1|2+ Mods equipped:
Collects Orbs of Power within 12.5|18.5 meters.

Also works on Motes of Light in Gambit.

Grants a Stacking Damage Buff and 20 Handling for 4.5 seconds on Weapon or Grenade Kills. Grenade Kills grant all 5 stacks.

Damage Buff Stacks: 6.7%|13.3%|20%|26.6%|33.3%

Buff duration is refreshed on Weapon or Grenade Kills.
descriptions.es:
Bajas con el Arma o Granadas otorgan:
Aumento de daño:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3%
+20 al manejo

El bufo se renueva con cada baja. Baja con granada otorga la maxima cantidad de Daño

Mejorado: La duracion del bufo aumenta a 5 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
当使用武器或手雷完成击杀时：
根据叠加层数获得 6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3% 伤害提升，并且 +20 操控性，持续 4.5 秒。

增益持续时间可在击杀时刷新。手雷击杀直接获得 5 层增益。

descriptions.en:
Increases Kinetic Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

While within 15 metres of an ally:
Grants a Stack of Nano-Munitions every 3 seconds, up to the maximum of 7. Consuming a Stack restarts the timer.

Consumes up to 4 Stacks upon emptying the magazine and refills 25% of it for each consumed Stack.

After 🡅1.4 seconds of Aiming Down Sights without firing, for one shot:
• 10% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
• Increases Precision Multiplier by 1 (e.g. 1.5x🠚2.5x)

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

The precision damage of Scout Rifles is decreased by 5% while Box Breathing is active. (This part of the perk is inconsistent and often doesn't get applied)

🡅 Activation time is reduced by 0.1 seconds.
Each stack of Gathering Light improves this weapon's reload, handling, and target acquisition.

Special Ammo Finder Bricks you create also spawn a copy for your allies.

Ammo Bricks spawned this way grant 27.5%|60% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2 Mods equipped.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.

Loads 2 Ammo at a time.
Reduces Reload Speed by 35.
descriptions.zh-chs:
每次填装两发弹药。
-35 填装速度。

descriptions.en: Damaging an opponent temporarily increases speed and handling.
Well-rounded, reliable, fires a 3-round burst.

Weapon Kills grant Stacks of Sword Logic.

The number of Stacks and the buff duration are tied to the highest [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) killed since activation:
• Minors: 1 Stack for 5.5 seconds
• Elites, Players: 2 Stacks for 7.5 seconds
• Minibosses and Players in their Super: 3 Stacks for 10.5 seconds
• Bosses: 4 Stacks for 15.5 seconds

Damage Increase at 1|2|3|4 Stacks:
15% | <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[20%] | 35% | 50%

Additional Kills refresh the buff duration to the duration tied to the highest Enemy Rank killed.

Remains active while stowed.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

The next Weapon Kill within 10 seconds of using your Class Ability spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.

Equipping multiple copies of the mod provides no benefit.

Hits and Kills with your Weapon grant you 'Points'. Hitting Point thresholds grants Stacks of Field Test.

Maximum of 5 Stacks. Buff is only removed on death.

Stat Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Field Test Stacks:
• 3|6|9|12|20 Range
• 5|10|20|35|55 Reload Speed
• (?) Stability and Handling
• 5|10|20|35|55 Charge Rate (Swords)
• 5|10|20|30|40 Guard Resistance (Swords)

Points required for 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 51|151|351|651|1001
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 26|76|176|326|501
• <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 11|31|71|131|201

Each Damage Instance (Weapon Hit) grants 1 Point regardless of Weapon Archetype and Enemy Rank.

Points granted by Kills are based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1-2 Minors: 1 Point
• Tier 3-4 Minors, Tier 2+ Elites, and higher: 4 Points
• Tier 1 Elites: 5 Points
• Enemy Players: 10 Points

Kill Point Multipliers by Weapon Archetype:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons and Shotguns: 5x
• Breech-Loaded Grenade Launchers: 2x

Grants the following benefits for your first shot (of the burst) after 3.1 seconds of not firing:
• 20 Aim Assist
• 25 Range
• -5% Accuracy Cone Size
• -10% Accuracy Cone Growth
descriptions.zh-chs:
第一发子弹:
•  +20 瞄准辅助
•  +25 射程
•  -5% 精度锥角尺寸
•  -10% 精度锥角增长

开火后触发 3.1 秒冷却时间。

descriptions.en: Breaking a Combatant Shield with the matching Elemental Damage Type grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Class Ability Usage changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

Kinetic Weapons lose their Kinetic Damage Bonus in PVE (10% on <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary, 15% on <:special:968793055631114330>Special).

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

Splits off 50% of the Weapon's Bodyshot Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that deals 30% Increased Damage in PvE and isn't affected by Damage Falloff.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PvE] Total damage is increased by 15% of the weapon's Bodyshot Damage. For crits, the overall increase is roughly equal to 15% divided by the Crit Multiplier.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PvP] Total damage remains roughly the same.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Finishers with no active Armor Charge Stacks grant 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Weapon Kills grant a Stack of Onslaught for 4.5 seconds. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

Benefits at 1|2|3 Stacks of Onslaught:
• 16% | 28% | 37% Decreased Firing Delay
• 15 | 25 | 35 Reload Speed

Grants the following to Strand Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Passively Grants the following to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Spawns a Threadling on Enemy Death Location on Precision Kills.

For weapons that cannot deal Precision Damage:
Scoring 3? kills within 3? seconds of each spawns a Threadling.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a <:void:720178940240461864>Void or Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

'Multi-Dodge Ready' appears on the Buff List while within 15 meters of an enemy.

Dodging while Multi-Dodge is ready allows you to chain dodges infinitely for 6 seconds. Kills extend the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to 11 seconds.

Multi-Dodge Dodges don't activate:
• <:stasis:915198000727461909>Winter's Shroud and Threaded Specter Aspects
• Dynamo, Bomber, Outreach, and Distribution Armor Mods

Ensnaring Slam removes the buff after one usage.

Finishing a reload Overflows the Magazine from reserves by 10% for each ally within 15 meters.

Maxes out at 50% Increased Magazine Capacity.
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内每有一名盟友：
填装时会过量填充 10% 的弹匣，最高 50%。

descriptions.en:
On Precision Kill:
Spawns a Large <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystal on Enemy Death Location.

[Tier 1-2 Minor](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) Combatants only spawn a Medium <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystal.

5 second cooldown if 5 Stasis Crystals are simultaneously active.
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准击杀时：
在目标附近生成一块<:stasis:915198000727461909>冰影水晶。
普通敌人生成中型水晶，高阶敌人生成大型水晶。

生成 5 块水晶后将进入 5 秒冷却。

descriptions.en: Precision hits build up Dynamic Charge. Swapping to Arc Seeker mode increases damage and partially reloads the magazine based on the number of charges.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Powered Hits grant 3% Increased Damage for 🡅4 seconds. Stacks 10 times for a 30% Buff.

Blocking removes all stacks.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Missing has a chance to refund ammo:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 🡅40%
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 🡅25%

🡅 Ammo Refund chance is increased by an additive 5%.

Upon scoring a set percentage of the Magazine Capacity as hits within ? seconds of each:
Fires a Tracking Rocket that matches Weapon's Elemental Damage Type.

Rockets deal <:pve:922884406073507930>22.4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[14] impact and <:pve:922884406073507930>24 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15] explosive damage on hit and inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling). On non-primary weapons, the rockets receive and additional Damage Increase.

% of Magazine Capacity as hits required and the Additional Damage Increase by weapon archetype:
• Hand Cannons, Pulse Rifles, Submachine Guns: 45% Magazine Capacity \\ 0% Increased Damage (Baseline)
• Sniper Rifles: 50%? \\ 100%
• Grenade Launchers: 30% \\ 25%
• Machine Guns: 25% \\ 50%
• Fusion Rifles, Shotguns: ?% \\ 150%

Further hits do not provide activation progress for 1 second after activation.

On Precision Kill:
Target explodes, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>123.89 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[95.3] damage that matches the element of the weapon over a 4.5 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.
This weapon is Full Auto, does extra damage to Cabal, and penetrates Phalanx shields.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy projectile attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

Increases Damage against shielded targets:
• 125% Increase against PVE Combatant Shields
• 20% Increase against Player Overshields and for bodyshots against Players with Woven Mail

Combatant Shields include Barrier Champion Shields, Elemental Shields, and Lucent Moth/Shadow Legion [Tech Pack](https://www.destinypedia.com/Tech_Pack) Overshields.

🡅 Damage Buff is increased.

Scoring 2 to 3 <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapon Surge for <:pve:922884406073507930>11 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6] seconds. Further <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard with a cooldown matching Towering Barricade's.

On Glacial Guard Cast:
• Grants Shielded buff for 20 seconds
• Grants the maximum 4 Stack of Weapon Surge
• Applies 40 <:stasis:915198000727461909>Slow Stacks to PvE Combatants within 7 meters

Shielded:
• Grants a 100 HP Overshield <:pve:922884406073507930>that provides 62.5% Damage Resistance in PVE (breaking this overshield removes the buff)
• Prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding
• Cannot regain Class Ability Energy while active
• Taking damage refreshes the buff duration
• Class Ability activation removes the buff

Glaive Melee Kills refill 1 Ammo into the Magazine from reserves. Can overflow the Magazine up to double the normal capacity.

While within 15 meters of 3+ enemies:
Grants 50 Reload Speed and 100% Increased Melee Damage to Glaives.

On Projectile Kills with Glaives Matching your Subclass Element:
Enemies explode, dealing up to <:pve:922884406073507930>350 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[101] damage in a 4? meter radius.

Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine and grants 20 Range and 30 Stability for 3 seconds OR until firing.

Only active for the first shot (of the burst).

0.3 second cooldown after activation but can be reactivated multiple times during a slide by firing off shots loaded by the perk.

🡅 Stronger Effect.

Grants the following benefits if you have not dealt or received damage in the last 5 seconds:
• 20 Range and 20 Handling
• 15% Decreased Draw Time on Bows
• 10.78% Increased Damage against PvE Combatants. Linear Fusion Rifles only receive an 8.88% Damage Increase.

Deactivates 2 seconds after exhanging damage.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.
Precision kills grant the next shot chain-lightning capabilities.
Precision Hits decrease Draw Time by 25% for 3 seconds.
descriptions.es:
En tiros de Precision:
Reduce en un 25% el tiempo de tensado durante 3 segundos

Aumentado: Aumenta la duracion del bufo a 4 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准命中时：
-25% 蓄力时间，持续 3 秒。

descriptions.en:
While below 113 HP:
Linearly grants up to 100 Reload Speed, and a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier.
descriptions.zh-chs:
低于 113 生命值时：
最高 +100 填装速度，0.9x 填装动画系数

根据生命值降低而线性提升增益效果。

descriptions.en: This weapon fires a small auto-tracking missile. Missiles lock onto targets when aimed.
Poison final blows return ammo to the magazine.

Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness.

Grants Peregrine Strike after sprinting for 2 seconds and being airborne for 0.5 seconds. Buff is removed upon touching the ground.

Peregrine Strike increases the Impact Damage of Shoulder Charge Abilities by 225%.

Against [Minibosses](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) (inlcuding Champions and Tormentors), the buff is increased to 1000% and refunds your Melee Ability charge on hit.

Provides no benefits when hitting <:stasis:915198000727461909>Frozen enemies.

On Powered Melee or Finisher Kills:
Grants <:void:720178940240461864>Void Invisibility and restores Health, with Finishers providing a greater benefit to both.

Invisibility Duration and restored Health are based on the [rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) of the defeated target. <:void:720178940240461864>Echo of Persistence increases Invisibility duration by 41.5%.

Invisibility|Health granted on Powered Melee Kills:
• Minors: 6.8 seconds | 100 HP
• Elites, Enemy Players: 9.8s | ? HP
• Minibosses: 12.8s | ? HP
• Bosses: 13.3s | 200 HP

Invisibility|Health granted on Finisher Kills:
• Minors: 9.8 seconds | ? HP
• Elites: 12.7 seconds | 200 HP
• Minibosses: 15.8 seconds | 200 HP
• Bosses: ? seconds | ? HP
descriptions.zh-chs:
充能近战击杀获得<:void:720178940240461864>虚空隐身，并恢复 [?] 生命值。
（终结技的效果更显著）

隐身持续时间（使用终结技的效果）：
普通敌人 = 6.8 秒（9.8）
精英敌人/守护者 = 9.8 秒 （12.7）
次级首领 = 12.8 秒 （15.8）
首领 = 13.3 秒

坚韧回声可增加 41.5% <:void:720178940240461864>虚空隐身的持续时间。

首领和载具无法被终结。

descriptions.en:
Upon sliding after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds with your Class Ability fully charged:
Projects a 180° frontal shield that reflects all incoming projectiles for 0.45 seconds.

Reflected projectiles deal 50% increased damage.

After shield deactivation, 2% Class Ability energy is drained for every point of damage reflected.

Currently partially bugged and does not drain Class Ability Energy for projectiles reflected at the end of your slide.
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺 1.5 秒后滑行：
产生一个 180° 的正面护盾，可以反弹伤害和弹道。

滑行距离增加33%。

descriptions.en:
Scoring multiple hits against enemies spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy.

Hit requirements by weapon type:
• Bows: 5 Hits
• Swords: 10? Hits
• Shotguns: unknown
• Other: 67% of Magazine rounded down + 2 Hits

Grants 1 Stack of Rapid Hit per Precision Hit, improving Reload Speed and Stability for 2 seconds. Further Precision Hits refresh the duration.

Benefits at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 2|12|14|18|25 Stability
• 5|30|35|42|60 Reload Speed
• 0.99x|0.96x|0.95x|0.945x|0.92x Reload Duration Multiplier

While Magazine is at or above maximum capacity:
25% Increased damage and causes enemies to explode on death, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>444 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[162.5] damage in a [?] meter radius.

Passively grants 30 Magazine Size. (Identical to Extended Mag)

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

While Crouched:
• 30 Handling and 20 Stability
• -40% Accuracy Cone Size
• -17% Accuracy Cone Growth
• -80% Horizontal Recoil

Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles.
descriptions.zh-chs:
蹲下时：
+30 操控性，+20 稳定性， -40% 精度锥角尺寸，-17% 精度锥角增长, -80% 横向后座力。

该特性对融合步枪的效果减半。

descriptions.en:
Provides a stacking Damage Buff on Weapon Kills:
10% | 21% | 33.1% Increased Damage at 1|2|3 Stacks for 🡅5 seconds.

Weapon Kills refresh the buff's duration. Buff persists while stowed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Damaging a combatant heals the wielder.

While Aiming Down Sights with Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to a longer, more powerful burst.

While Aiming Down Sights with <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.
Kills with this weapon cause enemy targets to detonate and spawn Void projectiles that track targets.

Passively Grants the following to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

After scoring a kill or multiple Precision Hits within 5 seconds of each with a different weapon:
Grants the 'Cascade Point Ready' buff for 5 seconds.

Readying the weapon while Cascade Point Ready is active reduces Firing Delay for 🡅2.75 seconds.

Firing Delay is reduced by 30% on SMGs and Machine Guns and by 40% on other archetypes.

Activation progress on Precision Hits:
• Bows, Linear Fusion/Sniper Rifles, Shotguns: 50%
• Hand Cannons, Sidearms, Scout Rifles: 17.5%
• Auto/Trace/Pulse Rifles, SMGs, Machine Guns: 8%

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 0.25 seconds.

Weapon Hits grants a Stack of Precision Instrument for 1.25 seconds (2.1 seconds on Bows). Maximum of 6 Stacks. Missing removes all Stacks.

Precision Damage Increase at 1|2|... Stacks:
🡅5% | 10% | 15% | 20% | 25% | 30%
(More precisely: 🡅30% / 6 × [Stacks])

🡅 Precision Damage Buff is increased by 20%.

1 second after stowing <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

While at or above 50% Magazine Capacity:
Direct Hits apply 40 <:stasis:915198000727461909>Slow Stacks for <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.5] seconds to enemies within 4 meters.

Only activates once per shot/burst. Whisper of Durance increases slow duration by <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[0.5] seconds.

Activation Condition is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Grants the following on Weapon Kills for 5 seconds:
• 15% Increased Damage
• Maximized Movement Speed

Remains active even if stowed.
descriptions.es:
En baja con Espada:
Aumento de 15% al Daño, y pone a la velocidad de movimiento hacia adelante a 9 metros por segundo durante [?] segundos

Se mantiene activo al guardar la espada

Mejorado: Aumenta la duración del bufo a [?] segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
当刀剑击杀时：
提高 15% 伤害，增加移动和冲刺速度，增加挥舞刀剑的前冲距离，持续 [?] 秒。

武器收起时依然生效。

descriptions.en:
Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.
Powered Melee Hits make you and allies within 8 meters <:solar:720178909361995786>Radiant for 8 seconds.

Grants 400% Additional Base Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Regeneration Rate for <:pve:922884406073507930>6 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds once triggered by applying certain buffs to allies.

Empowering Rifts, Mods, Crest of Alpha Lupi's Healing Pulse, Precious Scars' Healing Burst, and Aeon Sect of Vigor's Healing

<:solar:720178909361995786>Restoration and <:solar:720178909361995786>Radiant effects applied to you last 50% longer.

Successive Hits while firing full-auto grant a scaling Damage Buff after scoring 12.5% of the Magazine Capacity as hits. Missing deactivates the buff.

Stacks displayed on-screen are only visual aides, the buff [ramps up with each shot](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock)  once active. Reaches maximum strength at 5 Stacks.

% of the Magazine Capacity as Hits required for each Visual Stack: 12.5%|35.5%|54.5%|74.5%|110.5%

Damage Buff ramps up from <:pve:922884406073507930>16.73% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10.46%] to <:pve:922884406073507930>40% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[25%] upon reaching maximum strength.

Assuming no missed shots, it provides roughly a <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15.85%] [Damage Buff on average](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) after firing 100% of the Magazine.

Activation Condition is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.
Radar immediately returns when no longer Aiming Down Sights. (Normally takes 1.5 seconds)

[Melee]  : Kinetic melee combo

descriptions.zh-chs:
让融合手雷自带快速投掷能力，并且在撞击物体时爆炸。

使用融合手雷击杀敌人可以获得手雷能量。
对于普通敌人，获得25%的能量；
对于精英敌人，获得50%的能量；
对于守护者、次级首领、首领，获得100%的能量。

descriptions.en:
Finisher and (Glaive) Melee Kills grant a Stack of Burning Fists up to the maximum of 5 Stacks.

After not having scored further Finisher or (Glaive) Melee Kills for 2 seconds, your Stacks start decaying one at a time over 9.5|10|4|4|3 seconds for the 1st|2nd|... Stacks.

Damage Increases at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• Melee: 55%|110%|165%|220%|275%
• Glaive Melee: 40%|80%|120%|160%|200%
• <:pve:922884406073507930>Weapon\\PVE: 0%|20%|25%|30%|35%
• <:pvp:922884468275019856>Weapon\\PVP: 0%|0%|20%|25%|25%

Weapon Damage Increases are [Empowering Buffs](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs).

“燃烧之拳”持续 5 秒，提供额外近战伤害，可叠加 5 层。

额外近战伤害：
55% | 110% | 165% | 220% | 275%

Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped.

20% Increased Precision Damage

Rockets track the targeted enemy.

<:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 20%

(Currently, you can reach up to a 300% Increase by fully reactivating the perk while at or below 250% Magazine Capacity)

对 15 米范围内的敌人造成近战伤害后：

4 秒冷却时间。武器在收起时也可触发。

descriptions.en:

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing right next to the barricade also consistently prevents emeny melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
• 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 50% Flinch Resistance
• 30 Stability
• 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Performs an quick first-person dash, moving 8 meters in your current input direction.

Not inputting a movement direction results in a 4 meter backwards dash.

Only usable while on the ground.

所有武器 +100 操控性，0.825x 操控动画系数，持续8.5 秒。

10% Increased Effective Zoom and 5% Faster Projectile Speed.

The Effective Zoom increase pushes out Aim Assist Falloff by 10%. It also reduces Recoil by 10% and narrows the Accuracy and Aim Assist Cones by the same amount.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

Minors: 34% | Players, Elites, and higher: 100%

提升冲刺速度，持续 10 秒。

守护者、强力战斗人员、高价值目标会更快地触发此增益。

1 second cooldown between activations.

The debuff Duration and application radius are dependent on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 15 meter radius, 10 second duration
• Elites, Players: 20m radius, 15s duration
• Minibosses and Bosses: 25m radius, 20s duration

Finishers increase the debuff duration by 5 seconds, up to the maximum of 20 seconds.

(Still requires retesting, will update once complete)
descriptions.zh-chs:
充能近战击杀和终结技会在敌人周围施加削弱效果（+30% 承受伤害）和致盲效果。
持续时间和范围取决于敌人的等级。

击杀敌方守护者视为精英的效果。首领无法被终结。

敌人的等级分为普通敌人/精英/次级首领/首领。
范围：10/15/20/25 米，以敌人为中心。
持续时间：5/10/15/20 秒。
终结技持续时间：10/15/20/- 秒。

descriptions.en:
Finishing a reload within 5.2 seconds of a Precision Kill reduces Firing Delay by 30% for 🡅7 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.

Grants 30|50|60 Strength with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants the following to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Reduces Incoming <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Weapon Kills grant Stacks of Sword Logic.

The number of Stacks and the buff duration are tied to the highest [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) killed since activation:
• Minors: 1 Stack for 5.5 seconds
• Elites, Players: 2 Stacks for 7.5 seconds
• Minibosses and Players in their Super: 3 Stacks for 10.5 seconds
• Bosses: 4 Stacks for 15.5 seconds

Damage Increase at 1|2|3|4 Stacks:
15% | <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[20%] | 35% | 50%

Additional Kills refresh the buff duration to the duration tied to the highest Enemy Rank killed.

Remains active while stowed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants more than 29 meters away by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

While above 50% Magazine Capacity:
50 Reload Speed with a 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier.
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹匣内子弹量高于 50% 时：
+50 装填速度，装填动画时间缩减为 0.95x。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

After sprinting for 3 seconds:
Increases Reload Speed for 3 seconds.

Duration can be refreshed by tapping sprint. Being <:arc:720178925317128243>Amplified increases the bonus.

Grants 30|50|60 Resilience with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.
Decreases charge time by 40ms and damage by 2%.
descriptions.es: Reduce en 40ms el tiempo de carga y reduce daño en 2%
descriptions.zh-chs: -40ms 充能时间，-2% 伤害。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills grant 10% Melee Ability Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant 20%.

Dealing Melee Damage grants 35 Handling for 3 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
<:primary:968793055677251604> 主武器和 <:heavy:968793055652106320> 重武器击杀可获取 10% 近战技能能量。
大多数 <:special:968793055631114330> 特殊武器获取 20% 能量。

偃月、追踪步枪、榴弹发射器相较其他特殊武器，仅获得一半能量。

使用近战技能造成伤害获得 +35 操控性，持续 3 秒。将 重新装填 弹匣。

descriptions.en:
While on a <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Subclass:

Replaces Dodge with Shift:
Shift has a travel distance of 10 metres and renders you completely invisible (except for a trail) and invulnerable for the duration of the shift.

Shift usage grants 4 Stacks of <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc and <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapon Surge for 11 seconds. Class Ability Energy is locked to 0% while the Weapon Surge buff is active.

Linearly grants up to 30 Handling, -40% Accuracy Cone Size, and -17% Accuracy Cone Growth as health decreases below 156 HP.

Effect reaches maximum strength at Critical Health.
descriptions.zh-chs:
生命值低于 156 时：
最高 +30 操控性，-40% 精度锥角尺寸，-17% 精度锥角增长.

当生命值减少时，该效果线性提升，生命值降低到重伤时达到最高值。

descriptions.en:
Receiving damage highlights the enemy that dealt it for 8 seconds. Highlighting cannot be transfered to a different target before it expires.

Killing the highlighted enemy grants the Vengeance buff for 6 seconds, providing a 95 HP Overshield.

Highlighting is disabled while Vengeance is active.

Grants the following to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Upon readying the Weapon, for 1 second:
Grants 100 Ready/Stow Handling, and 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier.

Buff goes away as soon as ADS input is pressed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
拔枪时：
+100 拔枪/收枪操控性，0.95x 拔枪动画系数，持续 1 秒，或直到瞄准。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants more than 29 meters away by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Grants Passive Stat Bonuses depending on your selected Subclass.

<:solar:720178909361995786>Solar: 🡅55 Reload Speed
<:arc:720178925317128243>Arc: 🡅55 Handling
<:void:720178940240461864>Void: 🡅25 Stability
Strand: 🡅25 Airborne Effectiveness
<:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis: 🡅25 Recoil Direction & 5% reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty

🡅 Stat Bonuses are increased by 5.
descriptions.zh-chs:
根据当前的分支职业增加属性：

火： 🠅+55 填装速度
电： 🠅+55 操控性
虚空： 🠅+25 稳定性
冰影： 🠅+25 后座方向，降低 5% 瞄准时移动速度惩罚

🠅 相应属性额外 +5。

descriptions.en:
After being in Combat for 6 seconds:
Grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness and 35% Flinch Resistance for 🡅12 seconds.

Can activate while stowed. Dealing and receiving damage refreshes the buff duration.

For Pefect Float, being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 🡅3.5 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 2 seconds. Allowed time between damage exchanges is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Passively Grants the following to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Grants <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5%] Damage Resistance to Players inside your Rift. (Works while inside a <:solar:720178909361995786>Well of Radiance if you cast a Rift inside it)

Reaching Critical Health grants the Dearly Departed buff, granting <:pve:922884406073507930>50% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[25%] Class Ability Energy.

Buff lasts until you are no longer at Critical Health, essentially serving as a Cooldown.

Spawns a Healing Rift on Death at your location.
Decreases Hipfire Accuracy Cone Size by 30% and grants a 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier.
Using a Noble Round on an ally heals them and grants both you and them a weapon damage bonus for a short duration.
Weapon Kills restore 7 HP.
descriptions.zh-chs: 武器最后一击恢复 7 生命值。

descriptions.en:
Grenade Ability usage and Powered Melee hits grant 1 Stack of Well-Rounded. Super Ability usage grants 2 Stacks.

Grants 10 Range, 10 Stability, and 10 Handling per stack for 15 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.
descriptions.zh-chs:
投掷手雷或使用充能近战击中目标可获得 1 层全面发展增益，使用超能可获得 2 层增益。

每层增益 +10 射程，+10 稳定性，+10 操控性。
最高叠加 2 层，持续 15 秒。

descriptions.en: Decreases Charge Time by 40ms without affecting damage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
-40ms 充能时间
不会降低伤害。
不会显示在武器属性中。

descriptions.en: Blighted targets take damage over time and blight the nearby area on death.
Hard-hitting two-burst fire.
Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

Weapon Hits grant Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy.

Incandescent <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch ticks and Chain Reaction or Dragonfly elemental explosions count as hits.

Ability Energy gains on hits by weapon:
• Trustee: 0.354%
• Posterity: 0.463%
• Commemoration: 0.42%
• Heritage: 0.86%
• Succession: 1.5%
• Bequest: 2% (Grenade and Class Ability only)
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

On Weapon Kill against an enemy affected by a Void Debuff:
Grants a 45 HP Void Overshield for 8 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器击杀受虚空负面效果影响的敌人时：
获得一个 虚空覆盖护盾 ，持续 8 秒。

大多数“虚弱”效果都可以触发该特性（神性除外）.

descriptions.en: The Void rocket suppresses enemies. The Solar rocket causes damage over time.

On Grenade Ability Usage:
Changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

Kinetic weapons lose their Passive Damage Bonus (10-15%) against PVE Combatants.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

While within 8 meters of 3 Enemies:
🡅47% Increased Damage that lingers for 1.5 seconds after the condition is no longer met.

Swords only receive a 🡅41.75% Damage Increase.

Grenade and Rocket Launchers receive a 🡅41.75% Explosive Damage Increase and a 🡅47% Impact Damage Increase. Wolfpack Rounds receive a 🡅41.75% Explosive Damage Increase.

🡅 Damage is increased by a further 5%. (40%🠚47%, 35%🠚41.75%)

Increases Melee Damage by 100% for 1.22 seconds after hitting a target with 🡅10 of the 12 Shotgun Pellets in the spread.

Against [Bosses and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants), this is increased to 150% for the following melee options:
All Unpowered Melees, <:arc:720178925317128243>Combination Blow, <:arc:720178925317128243>Disorienting Blow, <:arc:720178925317128243>Chain Lightning, and Grapple Melee

The following options do not benefit from the perk:
• Hunters: <:solar:720178909361995786>Proximity Explosive Knife's and <:void:720178940240461864>Snare Bomb's detonations, <:arc:720178925317128243>Tempest Strike, <:stasis:915198000727461909>Withering Blade, Threaded Spike
• Titans: <:solar:720178909361995786>Throwing Hammer, <:solar:720178909361995786>Consecration, <:arc:720178925317128243>Thunderclap, <:void:720178940240461864>Shield Throw, Flechette Storm
• Warlocks: all abilities except <:arc:720178925317128243>Chain Lightning

The buff does not stack with the passive Melee Damage Increase against <:stasis:915198000727461909>Frozen non-Boss targets. The [higher buff of the two](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1N_zEcw3-pGL2jGUCGaAHjoKEr_VIbDc7-UWel-DGmys/) takes precedence.

This means that with the exception of <:stasis:915198000727461909>Shiver Strike and <:stasis:915198000727461909>Howl of the Storm in PVE where the perk's buff is always higher, it will only provide a benefit over the buff from <:stasis:915198000727461909>Freeze against Bosses and Vehicles.

🡅 Requires 2 fewer Shotgun Pellets to activate.

While Aiming Down Sights with <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Transmutation spheres you create can be picked up and wielded as weapons by you or your allies.
• [Light Attack]  : Light attack
• [Heavy Attack]  : Heavy attack
• [Block]  : Guard/Drain nearby combatants

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Defeating targets builds stacks of Overcharge.

[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap firing modes when fully Overcharged.

In alternative firing mode, hold the trigger to charge up and fire more powerful linear fusion shots.
Full Auto. Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

If Heavy Attack consumes all remaining Sword Ammo:
67% Increased Damage for Grounded Heavy Attack.
descriptions.zh-chs:
如果你的重攻击消耗掉的是你的最后一发弹药：
+67% 地面伤害.

descriptions.en:
Upon sprinting for 0.5 seconds with a Shoulder Charge (or Ballistic Slam) Melee Ability charge:
Charges up a 75 HP Overshield over 3 seconds.

Overshield is instantly removed if no longer sprinting.

Grants 50% Melee Ability Energy upon dealing damage with the mentioned Melee Abilities. Prevents Melee Kickstart from activating.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在满生命值的情况下装备肩撞类近战且充能完毕时：

冲刺后 0.5 秒开始，在 3 秒内逐渐获得 75 生命值的覆盖护盾。
停止冲刺时覆盖护盾立即消失。

肩撞技能击中敌人后回复 50% 的近战充能。

有效的近战技能包括地震打击、弹道猛击、战锤打击、圣盾强袭。

descriptions.en:
Upon readying the weapon, for 2 seconds:
• 30% Decreased Charge Time
• 20% Decreased Damage
• 100 Handling

Weapon must be stowed for 3.5 seconds before readying for the perk to activate.

🡅 Buff duration is increased.
Sets the Submachine Gun's Damage and Magazine Profile into that of a Precision Frame's.
descriptions.zh-chs: 将冲锋枪的伤害和弹匣属性调整为精确框架的数值。

descriptions.en:
Swords are granted 30|50|60 Charge Rate with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Glaive Projectile Hits grant 20%|30%|35% Increased Weapon Energy. (Stacks additively with Immovable Object)

Spawns a Threadling on Enemy Death Location on Precision Kills.

For weapons that cannot deal Precision Damage:
Scoring 3? kills within 3? seconds of each spawns a Threadling.

Upon Sliding after Sprinting for 1.5 seconds:
15% Increased Damage and 20% Decresed Charge Time for ? seconds.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy slam attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

On Weapon Kill, for 🡅7.5 seconds:
Grants 1 Stack on Bodyshot Kills and 2 Stacks on Precision Kills. Maximum of 4 Stacks.

Duration is refreshed on Weapon Kills.

Each stack grants 5 Range, 8 Stability, and -1.25% Accuracy Cone Size.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

On Weapon Kill, for 🡅9.5 seconds:
Grants 100 Handling and a 0.825x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier to all weapons.

Additional kills while the perk is active refresh the duration to 6.5 seconds.

🡅 Initial Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot track targets across the ground and unleash chain lightning on impact.

Scoring 4 Precision Hits within 🡅3 seconds of each refunds 2 Ammo to the Magazine.

🡅 Allowed time between Precision Hits is increased by 1 second.

Starts Health Regeneration and restores 🡅85 HP upon reaching 100% Activation Progress with Weapon Kills.

Activation Progress by Enemy Rank:
• Minor Combatants: 33.3%
• Players: 66.6%
• Majors and Bosses: 100%

Weapon Kills must be within 5 seconds of each.

🡅 Heals for an additional 5 HP.

Increases Super Energy Gains from Grenade Kills based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) with 1|2|3 Mods equipped:
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 1%|?|?
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: ?|?|?
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: ?|?|?
• T4 Minors, T3-T4 Elites, and higher: 5%|?|?
• Players: ?|?|?

Bonus Super Energy gains from Grapple Melee Kills are reduced by 50%.

Class Ability Usage grants 1 Stack of Tight Fit to the wearer and allies within 15 meters for 15 seconds.

While Tight Fit is active:
• Kills or Dodges grant an additional Stack up to a maximum of 5 and refresh the duration of the buff.
• Allies within range receive the same number of Stacks as the wearer when the buff is refreshed.

Stat Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 30|35|40|45|50 Airborne Effectiveness
• 40|40|45|50|55 Handling and Reload Speed
• 1x|0.925x|0.915x|0.91x|0.89x Reload Duration Multiplier

After Damaging 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each: 35% Increased Damage for 🡅11 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.
Reloading immediately after a kill grants a brief period of invisibility.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Remaining invisible grants this weapon increased damage for a brief duration.

Hitting a target with this weapon's projectiles while Shot in the Dark is active weakens them.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Weapons matching your Subclass Element and the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles, Swords, and Grand Overture.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.
Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Grants an extra Grenade Ability Charge.

Does not stack with <:arc:720178925317128243>Touch of Thunder's extra <:arc:720178925317128243>Lightning Grenade charge.
descriptions.zh-chs:
获得额外一次手雷技能充能。
手雷技能数量上限为 2。

descriptions.en: This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

Class Ability Usage grants 6.25% Increased Sprint Speed for 10 seconds. Duration is not refreshable.

Sprinting grants the following benefits:
• <:pve:922884406073507930>100% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[200%] Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate
• <:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: Grenade and Melee Ability Regeneration Rate is doubled
• <:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 100% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate

(Multiplicative Ability Regeneration Rate Increase in PVE is applied after all Aditive Ability Regeneration Rate Modifiers)
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺时：
• [PVE] 手雷和近战技能的充能速度翻倍。
• [PVP] 100% 额外的基础手雷/近战再生速度。
• 100% [PVP：200%] 额外的基础职业技能充能速度。

闪身时：
+6.25% 奔跑速度，持续10秒。
持续时间无法被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Kinetic Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Lumina.

Standing in a Rift creates Noble Seekers every 5 seconds that seek out allies within 35 meters and apply a buff:
• Healing Rift Seeker: restores 75 HP and starts Health Regeneration
• Empowering Rift Seeker: <:pve:922884406073507930>35% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] Increased Damage for 5 seconds

Amount of Noble Seekers spawned is equal to [Fireteam Size]-1, with a minimum of 1 Seeker.

Each time a Noble Seeker applies a buff, the Rift Duration gets extended by 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
为流明被动提升 +30 空中效率。

站在裂缝中每 5 秒会产生一个寻找盟友的高贵追踪弹，在35米范围内寻找盟友，并根据你站立的裂隙的类型给他们施加一个增益效果。
产生的高贵追踪弹数量等于队伍人数减 1，最低为 1 个。

每当一个高贵追踪弹施加一个增益效果，裂隙的持续时间延长 5 秒。

治疗裂隙产生的追踪弹为友军提供 75 点生命值，并开始恢复生命值。
强能裂隙产生的追踪弹为友军提供持续 5 秒的 <:pve:922884406073507930>35% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] 伤害增益。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following for 🡅8 seconds upon readying the weapon within 7? seconds of scoring a kill with a different weapon:
• 0.75?x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
• 25% Decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 30 Airborne Effectiveness

Weapon Kills while Discord is active fully refill the Magazine of <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons, and refund 1 Ammo for <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1? second.

Grants the following benefits while Crouched:
• Prevents Radar Ping when shooting
• [?] Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
• Increases Arrow Hold Time by 25%
descriptions.zh-chs:
蹲下时：
防止蹲伏射击时产生雷达信号。
[+?] 填装速度，0.8x 装填动画系数，提升保持拉弓最长时间 25%。

descriptions.en:
Drengr's Lash creates 2 additional Lashes. Lashes are granted stronger seeking capabilities and travel ?% farther.

Grants Woven Mail for 10 seconds upon applying Suspension to enemies.
Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.
Fires a single-slug round. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Grants an extra Coldsnap Grenade Ability Charge.

Coldsnaps Grenades have better tracking, travel 35% further, and grant Grenade Ability upon hitting or freezing an enemy.

Grenade Ability Energy gains based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• 7%: Enemy Players
• 10%: Tier 1 Minors
• 22%: Tier 2 Minors, Tier 1 Elites
• 34%: Tier 3 Minors, Tier 2 Elites
• 50%: Tier 4 Minors, Tier 3-4 Elites, Minibosses, and Bosses

The next 5 Hits within 8 seconds of using your Class Ability seconds apply Sever.

Applying Sever refreshes the buff duration. Activates even while stowed.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Aiming Down Sights while Airborne grants Tome of Dawn while on a Solar Subclass.

Tome of Dawn lasts 2.8 seconds and holds you in place midair. Weapon hits add ? seconds to its duration.

Tome of Dawn grants the following benefits:
• 50 Airborne Effectiveness
• 25% Flinch Resistance
• 15% Damage Resistance
• Weapon Kills refill the magazines of all equipped <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons from reserves

Grants the following with Fusion Grenades equipped:
• An extra Grenade Charge
• 100% Class Ability Energy on Fusion Grenade Kills
• Passive 20% Additional Base Grenade Ability Recharge Rate

While in an Empowering Rift or Well of Radiance:
• Grants 20% Grenade Energy on Weapon Kills
• Grants 2.5% Grenade Ability Energy on Weapon Hits with a 0.4 second cooldown

Scoring 2 to 3 <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapon Surge for <:pve:922884406073507930>11 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6] seconds. Further Arc Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Grants a 75 HP Overshield upon casting the <:arc:720178925317128243>Fists of Havoc Super that negates Precision Damage.

Grants the maximum 4 Stacks of Weapon Surge after the <:arc:720178925317128243>Fists of Havoc Super ends.
descriptions.zh-chs:
施放浩劫之拳时获得一道力场护盾。

力场护盾为一个 75 生命值，可以抵消精准伤害的覆盖护盾。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming AoE Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Passively grants:
• 35% Increased Projectile Velocity
• 20 Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier to Rocket Launchers
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier to Glaives and Grenade Launchers

(Reload Duration Multiplier for Bows is unknown)
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提升：
• +35% 弹头速度
• +10 填装速度，0.8x 填装动画系数

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Passively decreases the ADS Animation Duration:
• 50% Decrease on <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons
• 20% Decrease on <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons
descriptions.zh-chs:
主武器瞄准动画系数调整为 0.5x。
特殊武器瞄准动画系数调整为 0.75x。

descriptions.en:
Grants ?% Increased Blast Radius while within 15 meters of 3 enemies. Lingers for 4 seconds.

Reduces Self-Damage by 40% on Grenade Launchers and by ?% on Rocket Launchers.

Rocket Launcher explosions now apply knockback to you to allow for rocket jumping.
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内有 3 个敌人时：
增加 [?]% 爆炸范围，降低 40% 自身伤害。
（自身伤害的伤害量通常会提升 25%。）

线性持续 4(?) 秒。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power on Grenade Kills. 10 second cooldown between activations.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 0.8%|1.1%|1.25% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Passively Grants the following to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upon readying the weapon after scoring Kills with your other Weapons:
Overflows Magazine from reserves based on the amount of Weapon Kills achieved.

Magazine Capacity Increase per Weapon Kill:
<:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 10%
<:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 20%

Maxes out at 150% Increased Magazine Capacity if activated with a full Magazine. Always rounds up.

(Currently, you can reach up to a 300% Increase by fully reactivating the perk while at or below 250% Magazine Capacity)

Does not refill the Magazine before the overflow effect takes place, the percentages are added to your current Magazine Fill Level.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat combatants while using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Defeating combatants with precision damage will unlock this objective faster.

Defeating combatants in the Shattered Realm and Astral Alignment grants bonus progress.

Grants the following while at or below 110 HP:
• 50 Handling
• 0.95x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier
• Refills Magazine from reserves

Works and can activate while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
低于 110 生命值时：
+50 操控性，0.9 拔枪/收枪动画系数，并且重新填装武器。

武器收起时也有效。

descriptions.en: Grants 7.77% Increased Damage against [Elite and Miniboss Combatants](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants).
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对精英和强大的战斗人员的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Scoring multiple hits against enemies spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy.

Hit requirements by weapon type:
• Bows: 5 Hits
• Swords: 10? Hits
• Shotguns: unknown
• Other: 67% of Magazine rounded down + 2 Hits

🡅 Spawned Orbs grant more Super Energy.

Grants the following upon finishing a Reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
• 20 Aim Assist
• -20% Accuracy Cone Size
• ? ADS Handling for 5 seconds.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.
Fires full auto with deeper ammo reserves. Faster reload when weapon is empty.

Ammo Pickups grant 15 Range and 15% Flinch Resistance. Swords receive 100 Charge Rate instead.

Buff disappears 1.5 seconds after firing (or swinging the sword).

Grants 15% Decreased Charge/Draw Time while within 15 meters of 2+ enemies. The buff lingers for 1.5 seconds when no longer surrounded.

🡅 Grants 10 Stability while the perk is active.

Upon finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
25% Increased Damage for 5 seconds.

Buff stays active while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器击杀后 3.8 秒内换弹：
+25% 伤害，持续 5 秒。

增益持续时间无法被再次换单而刷新。武器收起时保持生效。

descriptions.en:
Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.
Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

While Aiming Down Sights with <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.
Hard-hitting four-burst fire.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Grants 10% Damage Resist upon reaching Critical Health while at 3 or more Stacks Armor Charge and consumes all Armor Charges.

Buff lasts 6|9|12|15 seconds with 3|4|5|6 Stack of Armor Charge consumed.
Increases Super Energy Gains from Melee Kills based on enemy rank.
Grants 10%|13%|15% Ability Energy to the least-charged Ability on Orb of Power pickups.

When a Class Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Class Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Class Ability Energy refunds.

Class Ability Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

While aiming-down-sights:
Decreases Shotgun Pellet Spread by 3.75%
Reduces Precision Damage by 7.6%
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准时：
-3.75% 弹头散布。
-[?]% 精准伤害系数。

descriptions.en:
Hits against Non-Matching or Barrier Champion Shields deal increasingly higher damage.
Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.

Damage Increase per Weapon Archetype:
• Fusion Rifles: 29% per hit, up to 435%
• Machine Guns, Auto/Pulse/Trace Rifles: 33.33% per hit, up to 500%
• Linear Fusion Rifles: 150% per hit, up to 450%
• Bows, Glaives, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 166.67% per hit, up to 500%
descriptions.es:
Luego de impactar con un Escudo de otro elemento al arma, o la Barrera de un Campeon:
Los proximos impactos aumentan en daño contra el escudo del enemigo.

El bufo se termina si se impacta contra un escudo con mismo elemento, o contra un enemigo sin escudo.

+29% por bala, hasta 435%: Fusil de Fusion

+33.3% por bala, hasta 500%:
Fusiles Automaticos, Fusiles de Pulsos, Fusiles de Rastreo y Ametralladoras

+150% por bala, hasta 450%: Fusiles de Fusion Lineales

+166.6% por bala, hasta 500%;
Arcos, Gujas, Cañones de Mano y Fusiles de Explorador

Mejorado: El daño aumentado por bala aumenta, y el maximo daño aumenta un 20%
Por ejemplo: 500% -> 600%
descriptions.zh-chs:
当命中与武器元素不匹配的护盾，或屏障勇士护盾时：
每次命中都会逐渐提升对护盾的伤害。

当命中与武器元素匹配的元素护盾，或没有护盾的敌人时，移除伤害增益。

融合步枪：每次命中提升 29%，最高 435%

自动步枪、脉冲步枪、追踪步枪、机枪：每次命中提升 33.3%，最高 500%

线性融合步枪：每次命中提升 150%，最高 450%

弓箭、偃月、手炮、斥候步枪：每次命中提升 166.6%，最高 500%

descriptions.en:
Kills have a chance to release a varying number of Submunitions on top of where the enemy died.
6? second cooldown after activation.

The number of Submunitions spawned and the Spawn Chance are tied to [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 1 Submunition, ?% chance
• Elites, Players: 3 Submunitions, 100%? chance
• Minibosses: ? Submunitions, 100%? chance
• Bosses: 7 Submunitions, 100%? chance

Submunitions:
• Identical to Telesto Bolts in behavior, exploding on proximity or contact and last up to 10.5 seconds after attaching to a surface.
• Deal up to <:pve:922884406073507930>39.5? <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] damage and inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).
<:solar:720178909361995786>Ignitions deal damage in a ?% increased radius.

Increases the number of <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch Stacks you apply to targets by 50% in most cases. Rounds up (e.g. 3🠚5).

Specific increases from <:solar:720178909361995786>Ember of Ashes for <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch sources can be found in their descriptions.

Killing 2 enemies within ? seconds of each with <:solar:720178909361995786>Ignitions creates an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 10 second cooldown after activation.

Killing <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorched enemies spawns a <:solar:720178909361995786>Firesprite and grants Melee Ability Energy based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 8%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 15%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 17.5%
• Players: 20%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%
Superb handling. Move faster with this lightweight weapon equipped. This weapon grants additional speed benefits when MIDA Multi-Tool is also equipped.
Fully charging the laser refills the magazine from reserves.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Hard-hitting four-burst fire.

Grants ?% Increased Blast Radius while within 15 meters of 3 enemies. Lingers for 4 seconds.

Reduces Self-Damage by 40% on Grenade Launchers and by ?% on Rocket Launchers.

Rocket Launcher explosions now apply knockback to you to allow for rocket jumping.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Blast Radius.

Grants the following to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Daybreak Kills spawn a Healing and Empowering Rift at Enemy Death Location.

Kills while standing in a Rift with your Class Ability Energy full also spawn a Healing and Empowering Rift at Enemy Death Location. Consumes Class Ability Charge.

Solar Weapon Kills grant Class Ability Energy based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• 9%: Tier 1 Minors
• 13%: Tier 2 Minors, Tier 1 Elites
• 15%: Enemy Players
• 20%: Tier 3 Minors, Tier 2 Elites
• 30%: Tier 4 Minors, Tier 3-4? Elites
• 40%: Minibosses
• 50%: Bosses

Kills inside the Healing and Empowering Rift do not grant Class Ability Energy. (Why?)

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Kinetic Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 2.5% with Forerunner.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Weapons matching your Subclass Element with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

While Aiming Down Sights with <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.
Applying an Elemental Debuff (with the exception of <:void:720178940240461864>Weaken) grants 50? Reload Speed for 4.5 seconds.

Grants the following to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Finisher consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant Class Ability Energy.

Energy Gains with 3|4|5|6 Stacks Consumed:
70% | 80% | 90% | 100%

Grants 30|50|60 Intellect with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

When a Melee Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Melee Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Melee Energy refunds.

Melee Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

Bug: Doesn't work if you have more recharged Melee Ability Energy than a single ability charge.
Combines the overpenetration from Armor-Piercing Rounds, the guaranteed ricochets from Ricochet Rounds, and the flinch increase from High-Caliber Rounds.
descriptions.zh-chs: 结合穿甲弹药的穿甲特性、弹跳型弹药的弹跳特性、高冲击力弹药的增大敌人后仰抖动特性。

descriptions.en:
While surrounded by at least 3 enemies within 15 metres:
Gain Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.

Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate with:
• 3 Enemies: 250%
• 4 Enemies: 666%
• 5 Enemies: 1085%
• 6+ Enemies: 1500%

1 second after casting Rift:
An Arc Shockwave is cast that deals <:pve:922884406073507930>300 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100] damage and knocks back enemies in a 7.5 meter radius.

Rifts emit an Arc Shockwave every 5 seconds, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>200 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[70] damage to enemies within ? meters.

Enemies killed by Shockwaves explode, dealing 100 damage (and Blinding nearby targets if on an Arc Subclass).

Upon Blocking an attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
Grats 50% Increased Damage for 2 seconds.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.
Passively grants 10 Airborne Effectiveness, 35 Reload Speed, and 35 Handling to all weapons.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Grants Grenade Ability Energy upon dealing Powered Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Grenade Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>12% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>17% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[8.5%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%]

Being within 15 meters of 3+ enemies grants the Biotic Enhancements buff for 8 seconds.

Biotic Enhancements benefits:
• ? Handling and 35 Reload Speed
• 50% Increased Super Damage
• <:pve:922884406073507930>165% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] Increased Melee Damage
• 100% Increased Glaive Melee Damage
descriptions.zh-chs:
被 3 名以上敌人包围时：激活生物强化

生物强化在 8 秒内提高近战和常能伤害。

50% 超能伤害。
PVE：提高 200% 近战伤害。
PVP：提高 100% 近战伤害。

扩大近战前冲范围到 7 米。

descriptions.en:
Melee Hits grant 1 Stack of Armor Charge. (Each damage instance is counted separately)

Having active Armor Charges grants Melee Damage Resistance. Receiving a Melee Attack consumes all Armor Charges and emits a <:arc:720178925317128243>Jolting <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Burst in a ? meter radius.

Benefits with 1|2|... Armor Charges:
• <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Burst Damage: 90|130|170|200|225|245
• Melee Damage Resistance: 23.3% | 46.7% | 70% | 73.3% | 76.7% | 80%
descriptions.zh-chs:
近战命中可获得的“狂怒导体能量”层数。
被近战命中会释放一个 5 米范围的<:arc:720178925317128243>电弧爆炸，造成 40 伤害。

“狂怒导体能量”提供近战伤害抗性，并提升电弧爆炸的伤害量，根据叠加层数增多。
33%   | 55%   | 70%   近战伤害抗性
100% | 200% | 300% 提升<:arc:720178925317128243>电弧爆炸伤害

受到近战伤害后，或 10 秒内未造成近战伤害，“狂怒导体能量”的层数将被移除。

descriptions.en:
Scoring 2 to 3 <:void:720178940240461864>Void Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapon Surge for <:pve:922884406073507930>11 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6] seconds. Further Void Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Grants the following on Powered <:void:720178940240461864>Void Melee Kills:
• <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Super Energy once per ability usage
• All 4 Stacks of <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapon Surge

Sentinel Shield's Shield Throw Hits grant 10% Super Energy, extending Super Duration.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用虚空近战技能击杀敌人会获得 <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] 超能能量，每次使用只能获得一次。

哨兵圣盾的圣盾投掷命中时，会回复 10% 超能能量。

descriptions.en:
After a Melee Kill, for 7.5 seconds:
Weapon Kills cause the enemy to explode, dealing up to <:pve:922884406073507930>123.5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] damage over a 4.5? meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling) and match the element of the Weapon.

Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack of Swashbuckler for 🡅6.5 seconds. Melee kills grant all 5 stacks. Buff duration is refreshed on Weapon or Melee Kills.

Damage Increase at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3%

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 2 seconds.

Only works with a <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Subclass.

Spawns a <:solar:720178909361995786>Sunspot under you upon reaching Critical Health (if your Class Ability is charged as it consumes a Class Ability Charge) or upon casting a Barricade.

The spawned <:solar:720178909361995786>Sunspot grants the Sol Invictus buff even without having the Aspect equipped. (The Aspect is still required to extend the sunspot's duration)
descriptions.zh-chs:
当职业技能充能完毕时受到重伤，或释放屏障时：
在你脚下生成一个太阳黑子。

仅在烈焰分支生效。
生成的太阳黑子即使没有装备“无敌索尔”星象也会获得其收益。

descriptions.en:
Upon scoring multiple hits within 6 seconds of each:
• Grants 40% Increased Damage against [Constructs and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) for 5 seconds
• Refills 10% of the Magazine from thin air

Hits against Constructs are not be able to trigger the perk but they contribute to its activation progress.

Passively grants 🡅55 Blast Radius.

Rockets attach on impact and detonate after 3 seconds, dealing an additional 25% Explosive Damage.
(Overall 20% increased total damage)

🡅 Grants 5 more Blast Radius passively.

On Precision Kill:
70 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier for 6 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准击杀后：
+70 填装速度，0.9x 填装动画系数，持续 6 秒。

descriptions.en: Finishers consume 2 Stacks of Armor Charge and grant 50% Ability Energy to your least-charged Ability.

Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack of Feeding Frenzy for 3.5 seconds, increasing the Reload Speed of the weapon. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 🡅13 | 🡅55 | 🡅65 | 🡅85 | 100 Reload Speed Stat
• 0.975x | 0.9x | 0.868x | 0.837x | 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier

🡅 Increases Reload Speed bonus by 5 at 1-3 Stacks and by 10 at 4 Stacks.

On Precision Kill:
Spawns a Large <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystal on Enemy Death Location.

[Tier 1-2 Minor](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) Combatants only spawn a Medium <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystal.

5 second cooldown if 5 Stasis Crystals are simultaneously active.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Upon readying the weapon within 3.5 seconds of getting kills with other weapons while it was stowed:
Grants 10 Handling, 10 Reload Speed, and 10 Stability per Stack for 🡅8.5 seconds.

Maximum of 3 Stacks. Buff is removed on stow.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Weapon Kills grant an additional 🡅1.33% Super Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant an additional 🡅2% instead.

🡅 Bonus Super Gains are increased by 33.3%. (e.g. 1.5% » 2%)

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
This weapon automatically reloads on ammo pickup.

On Precision Kill:
• Target explodes, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>104 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[80] Solar Damage in a 4 meter radius
• Grants 🡅55 Reload Speed for 6 seconds

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).

🡅 Grants 5? more Reload Speed.
While at full health, spinning up this weapon protects you with an Arc Shield.
Targets under the effects of Judgment long enough are struck with a burst of damage.
