命中后增加敌人的后仰抖动。

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 允许主武器作用于高阶敌人，并可使低阶普通敌人持续晕眩。

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 根据武器框架不同，增加敌方守护者 6% 至 11% 的后仰抖动，/>

descriptions.en:
Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Kinetic Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

On Precision Kill:
• Target explodes, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>104 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[80] Solar Damage in a 4 meter radius
• Grants 50 Reload Speed for 6 seconds

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).

Upon emptying the Magazine:
Refills 🡅70% of the number of Hits landed into the Magazine from reserves. Always rounds up.

Requires firing 28.75% of the Magazine Capacity for the refill to activate. Always rounds up.

Hits after triggering a refill do not count while the Rewind Rounds buff is active (1? second).

🡅 Refill ratio is increased by an additive 10%.

On Weapon Kill, for 5.5 seconds:
• 15 Stability
• 20 Recoil Direction
• -15% Accuracy Cone Size
• -15% Accuracy Cone Growth

Stacks 2 times. Cone scalars stack multiplicatively.

Duration is refreshed on kills. Stays active while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
-15% 精度锥角增长， +15 稳定性，+20 后座力方向。

可叠加 2 层。

descriptions.en:
Upon damaging 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each, for 10 seconds:
• 10 Stability
• 35 Handling
• 10 Range
• 5% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 35 Reload Speed
• 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier

Buff cannot be refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
3 秒内命中 3 个不同目标：
+10 射程，+5% 有效射程，+10 稳定性，+35 操控性，+35 填装速度，0.95x 填装动画系数，持续 10 秒。

该增益无法持续时间无法被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Passively Grants the following to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Upon readying the weapon, for 2 seconds:
• 30% Decreased Charge Time
• 20% Decreased Damage
• 100 Handling

Weapon must be stowed for 3.5 seconds before readying for the perk to activate.
descriptions.zh-chs:
切换至此武器时：
-30% 充能时间
-20% 伤害
+100 操控性

持续 [?] 秒。

descriptions.en:
Class Ability Usage while within 15 metres of an enemy grants Super Ability Energy.

Super Energy Gains with 1|2+ Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>2.5% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.25%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>4% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2.4%]

Energy Multipliers based on Class:
Hunters: x1 | Titans: x1.2 | Warlocks: x2

Passively grants Increased Damage against...
• [Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants): 15%
• Turrets, Barricades, Ward of Dawn, Well of Radiance: 30%
• Stasis Crystals: 45%
descriptions.zh-chs:
增加 15% 对载具和建筑物的伤害

增加 30% 对炮台、屏障的伤害

增加 45% 冰影水晶的伤害

descriptions.en:
Grants 20 Range while your shields are active (above 70 HP).

Getting your shields broken disables the buff. Reactivates ? seconds after your shields fully recharge.

🡅 Reactivation delay is decreased.

Upon readying a sword, for 🡅1.5 seconds:
🡅100% Increased Grounded and 🡅80% Increased Airborne Lunge Distance.

Deactivates after swinging once. 3 second cooldown.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds. Lunge Distance bonus is increased by 25%.
All Armor Charge sources grant an additional Stack.

Modifies <:solar:720178909361995786>Burning Maul into a single-use slam that deals 650% Increased Damage and releases 3 tracking Waves. Waves create Cyclones on impact which also track enemies.

Damage from multiple Cyclones can overlap.

Waves apply 20 (60 with <:solar:720178909361995786>Ember of Ashes equipped) <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch on Impact. The released Cyclones deal <:pve:922884406073507930>20 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[16] damage every 0.2 seconds, and apply 3 (5 with Ember of Ashes) Scorch every 0.56 seconds.

<:solar:720178909361995786>Consecration's slam creates a Cyclone that deals <:pve:922884406073507930>? <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] damage and does not have tracking.
All equipped weapons get refilled from reserves on melee kills.
descriptions.zh-chs:
造成近战击杀时：
全部武器将重新装填。

descriptions.en: This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

Diamond Lance creates a <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystal on impact. Hitting Bosses or Vehicles creates ? additional <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystals.

While on a Stasis Subclass and behind a Rally Barricade:
Scoring a Kill or 3 Precision Hits within ? seconds of each spawns a Diamond Lance next to you.

Shares Cooldown with the Diamond Lance Aspect but the Aspect is not required for the exotic to function.

Linearly grants the following benefits as the Magazine drops from 50% capacity to empty:
• 12.5% to 25% Decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• Linearly grants up to 30? Stability

Activation Condition is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹匣容量低于 50 % 时：
• 线性提供 -25% ~ -50% 精度锥角尺寸
• -[?]% 精度锥角增长
• +30(?) 稳定性

descriptions.en:
Grants 🡅65 Guard Resistance, Guard Endurance, and (Guard) Charge Rate on Sword Kills until stowed.

🡅 Grants 5 points of each Stat.
Detect enemies on your radar from farther away.
Precision kills briefly grant bonus handling, range, and precision damage with this weapon.

Energy Weapons are refunded 1 Ammo upon hitting Matching Elemental Shields.

Refills magazine upon breaking a PVP Combatant, Barrier Champion, or Guardian Shield.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

Grants the following benefits while Crouched:
• Prevents Radar Ping when shooting
• [?] Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
• Increases Arrow Hold Time by 25%

Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness

While standing in a <:solar:720178909361995786>Sunspot:
Solar Kills create <:solar:720178909361995786>Sunspots at the target's location.

Grants 350% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate if your <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Super is Charged.

Casting your Barricade emits a Healing Pulse:
Heals the wearer and allies within 12 meters if they have line of sight to the wearer.

Healing Pulse heals either FOR 58 HP or TO 130 HP, whichever option restores more health.

Super Abilities generate an extra Orb of Power that grants 7.14% Super Energy (regular Super Orb).

Specific Interactions:
• Roaming Supers start generating Orbs after just 1 Kill instead of needing at least 2
• <:void:720178940240461864>Ward of Dawn generates 4 Orbs with each granting 3.57% Super Energy (up from 3 Orbs granting 2.3% each for a ~2x increase)
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你释放屏障时：
会产生一个治疗脉冲，瞬间治愈你和 12 米范围内的盟友。

治疗脉冲治疗 58 点生命值，或者恢复至 130 点生命值。
取恢复血量更多的那个值。

需要对友军有直线视线。

超能会产生额外一个能量球。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Auto Rifles and Machine Guns.

Refills 10% of readied Auto Rifles' and Machine Guns' Magazines every 1.5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
对自动步枪和机枪 +30 空中效率。

对手持中的自动步枪和机枪每 1.5 秒装填其 10% 弹夹。

descriptions.en:
Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Grants 30|50|60 Recovery with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Weapons matching your Subclass Element with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.
Taking damage from your own worm projectile detonation empowers your weapons for a short time.

On Elemental, Barrier or Guardian Shield Break:
Weakens the enemy, increasing Kinetic Damage dealt by 50% for 5.5 seconds.

Stacks with all other Debuffs as it is a Weapon Perk.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用武器破坏敌人的护盾（元素护盾、屏障勇士护盾、守护者护盾）时：
对他们施加负面状态，额外承受 50% 的动能伤害，持续 5.5 秒。
不会作用于冰影伤害。

因其为武器特性，故可以与其他负面状态叠加。

descriptions.en: When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Grants the following while at or below 110 HP:
• 50 Handling
• 0.95x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier
• Refills Magazine from reserves

Works and can activate while stowed.

🡅 Activates with more health remaining.

Upon readying a Sword:
30% Increased damage for 1.5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
拔出刀剑时：
+30% 伤害，持续 1.5 秒。

descriptions.en: Bonus damage when aiming down sights on the opening shot of an attack. This bonus is preserved if the shot deals precision damage or strikes an elemental shield.
Increases charge time by 40 and damage by 2%.
descriptions.zh-chs: 增加 40 蓄力时间， 增加 2% 伤害。

descriptions.en: A precision final blow with this weapon creates an implosion that pulls in nearby targets and damages them with an additional detonation.

Grants the following benefits to Hand Cannons:
• 20 Airborne Effectiveness
• 100 Handling to Ready Speed
• 0.6x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier
• -40% Accuracy Cone Size for 4 seconds on Readying

Upon readying a Fully Loaded Kinetic or Matching Element Hand Cannon in PVE:
60% Increased Damage per hit for 5.5 seconds. Maxes out at 600% after 10 Hits.

Eriana's Vow only receives 30% Increased Damage per hit. Sturm's Overcharged Rounds, Malfeasance's Explosive Shadow, Hawkmoon's Paracausal Shot, and Payload Perks are unaffected by the buff.

After the Buff runs out, or you swap weapons:
Cannot gain stacks or reacquire the damage buff for 10 seconds.

Deadfall returns Ability Energy per Enemy Tethered:
• X% Super Energy up to the maximum of 50%
• 10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy

Moebius Quiver can fire an additional volley per Super Activation.

Passively grants 30% Damage Resistance against PVE Combatants while Airborne.

Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25% and Slide Distance by 33%. Greatly increases the initial momentum of all Jump Abilities.

Grants the following to Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier
Kills grant 5% Class Ability Energy.
descriptions.zh-chs: 使用此武器完成最后一击可获得 5% 职业技能能量。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power on Powered Melee Kills. 10 second cooldown between activations.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 0.8%|1.1%|1.25%|1.5% Super Energy with 1|2|3|4 Mods equipped. (4 Mods is only achievable through Exotic Armor)

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy dash attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.
One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher. Projectiles release a wave of energy when they contact the ground.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Finishing a reload within 5.3 seconds of a Weapon Kill grants Voltshot for 🡅8 seconds.

While Voltshot is active, your next Weapon Hit applies <:arc:720178925317128243>Jolt and consumes the buff.

🡅 Buff can be held 1 second longer.

After 1.25 seconds of sprinting, and while maintaining both sprint and a movement speed of at least 5 meters per second:
Grants <:pve:922884406073507930>150% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[75%] Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.

Deactivates once Class Ability Energy is full.
Scoring a Melee Hit grants 50 Reload Speed and a 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier for 5 seconds.

<:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapon Kills progress a counter that spawns an <:arc:720178925317128243>Ionic Trace at the killed target's location upon reaching 100%.

Activation progress granted by [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 34%
• Elites, Players: 67%
• Minibosses and Bosses: 100%

Killing a <:arc:720178925317128243>Jolted enemy creates an <:arc:720178925317128243>Ionic Trace.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 10 second cooldown between activations.
<:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Grenades apply <:arc:720178925317128243>Jolt upon dealing damage.

Sliding over Ammo Bricks refills your held weapon from reserves and grants Melee Energy.

<:special:968793055631114330>Special Ammo Bricks grant 20% Melee Energy and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Ammo Bricks grant 50%.

Grants <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Damage Resistance while within 15 meters of 3+ enemies.

Remains active for 2 seconds once the activation condition is no longer met.
Arc <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons Kills while <:arc:720178925317128243>Amplified create an explosion, <:arc:720178925317128243>Blinding enemies within ? meters.

Lightning Grenades release an additional lightning bolt. (4🠚5)

Pulse Grenade release an additional 2 pulses. (6🠚8)

Storm Grenade release a third volley, dealing the same damage as the second volley.

When combined with the <:arc:720178925317128243>Touch of Thunder titan aspect, Storm Grenade's Roaming Storm lasts 1.5 seconds longer. (4🠚5.5s)
Grants <:pve:922884406073507930>400% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[200%] Additional Base Grenade and Melee Ability Regeneration Rate while at Critical Health.

Passively grants 100 Guard Resistance and Guard Endurance to Swords.

While Guarding:
• Grants <:pve:922884406073507930>50% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Damage Resistance (Stacks multiplicatively with the Damage Resistance provided by Sword Guard against blocked attacks)
• Blocking a hit grants 2 Stacks of Perfect Guard. Maximum of 100 Stacks. (Cannot gain stacks while a <:solar:720178909361995786>Restoration effect is active)
• Sword Energy does not decay from holding guard

All Stacks are removed if no hits have been blocked in the last 10 seconds.

Dealing Sword Damage with active Perfect Guard Stacks grants <:solar:720178909361995786>Restoration x2:
<:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] second duration at 1 Stack, scaling up to <:pve:922884406073507930>16 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6] seconds at 100 Stacks.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Upon blocking damage with Glaive Shield:
Decreases Glaive Block's Movement Speed Penalty to 20?% for [?] seconds, or until you stop blocking.

(By default, the Movement Speed Penalty of Glaive Block is 45% with weapon energy and 25% without)

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.
High damage, high recoil.
High damage, high recoil.

Weapon Hits grant 1 Stack of the perk for 1 second up to the maximum of 5 Stacks.

Benefits granted per Stack:
• Grants ?% Flinch Resistance
• Reduces Visual Weapon Shake 34%
• Reduces Reticle Bounce by 34%

Stacks gained per Weapon Hit by weapon type:
• Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 2
• Pulse Rifles, Sidearms: 1.5
• Other Weapons: 1

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.
Gain 1 Ammo after scoring 3 Powered Hits within 2(?) seconds of each.
descriptions.zh-chs:
2 秒内进行三次有能量的轻攻击：
提供 1 枚刀剑弹药。

descriptions.en: Grants 10%|13%|15% Grenade Ability Energy on Orb of Power Pickups with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Upon Sliding after Sprinting for 1.5 seconds:
15% Increased Damage and 20% Decresed Charge Time for ? seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺 1.5 秒后滑行：
+20% 伤害，0.8 倍充能时间，持续 [?] 秒。

descriptions.en:
Extends Armor Charge decay time to 15|18|20 seconds with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Armor Charge decays at the rate of 1 Stack every 10 seconds by default with Passive Mods equipped.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants less than 4 meters away by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

When a Melee Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Melee Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Melee Energy refunds.

Melee Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

Bug: Doesn't work if you have more recharged Melee Ability Energy than a single ability charge.

While within 15 meters of 2 Allies:
20% Increased Precision Damage
descriptions.zh-chs:
[?] 米范围呢有两个以上友军时：
+20% 精准伤害。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Hits grant 10? Handling and 10? Reload Speed for 2 seconds. Stacks 5 times.

🡅 Stat bonuses are increased.

On Grenade Ability Usage:
Changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

Kinetic weapons lose their Passive Damage Bonus (10-15%) against PVE Combatants.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用手雷技能后：
将此武器的伤害类型切换至对应你的分支职业的属性，直到你收起此武器。

descriptions.en:
Grants 30|50|60 Discipline with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

30% Increased Glaive Melee Damage for 10 seconds upon scoring a Glaive Projectile Kill.

Dealing Projectile or Melee Damage extends the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to 10 seconds.

Persists through stow.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Extends Armor Charge decay time to 15|18|20 seconds with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Armor Charge decays at the rate of 1 Stack every 10 seconds by default with Passive Mods equipped.
Grants 15% Decreased Charge/Draw Time while within 15 meters of 2+ enemies. The buff lingers for 1.5 seconds when no longer surrounded.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当 15 米范围内有两个以上敌人时：
-15% 充能/蓄力时间。

增益持续 1.5 秒，效果线性减弱。

descriptions.en:
Passively Grants the following to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
Hard-hitting two-burst fire.

Refills 10% of the Magazine from reserves on Weapon Kills.

Submachine Gun and Auto Rifle Kills refill 17% of the magazine.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
重新装填 10% 弹匣（大部分武器）。

冲锋枪和自动步枪的装填量为 17%。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants:
• 100 Handling
• 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier
• -55%(?) Auto Aim Cone Size (No effect on Reticle Stickiness)
descriptions.zh-chs: 被动提升 +100 操控性，0.95x 拔枪动画系数，-80% 瞄准辅助锥角尺寸。

descriptions.en:
Assisting Allies by Reviving, Healing, or Empowering them, or granting Subclass Buffs to them grants 10 Stacks of Noble Deeds. Maximum of 10 Stacks.

Kills remove <:pve:922884406073507930>1 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2] Stacks of Noble Deeds.

Grants 30 Handling and 30 Reload Speed while you have active Stacks. Swords receive 20 Charge Rate.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Replaces Towering Barricade with Assault Barricade:
• 33% Decreased HP (600🠚400)
• Takes 25% Increased Damage from Enemy Players
• 50% Decreased Duration (20🠚10 seconds)
• 72.4% Increased Cooldown Time
• Allows caster and allies to shoot through it
descriptions.zh-chs:
将巍峨屏障变为突击屏障。

可以让你和你的盟友穿过它进行射击。

突击屏障属性：
600生命值 -> 350生命值
20秒 -> 10秒

descriptions.en:
Increases <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Class Ability usage drops a Parting Gift that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>440 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[120] damage over a 7.5 meter radius. Detonates instantly on contact with a surface or an enemy.

Parting Gift has an additional effect based on Subclass:
• <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc: Applies Lite Blind for <:pve:922884406073507930>7 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds
• <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar: Applies 40 <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch (60 with Ember of Ashes)
• <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis: Applies <:pve:922884406073507930>40 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[20] <:stasis:915198000727461909>Slow Stacks
• <:void:720178940240461864>Void: Applies Lite <:void:720178940240461864>Suppression for <:pve:922884406073507930>9 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[7] seconds
• Strand: Applies Sever for ? seconds

Lite <:void:720178940240461864>Suppression does not <:void:720178940240461864>Suppress guardians in their Super. Lite Blind does not synergize with the <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc elemental sandbox.
Grants 10%|13%|15% Melee Ability Energy on Orb of Power Pickups with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
Sustained fire boosts range and rate of fire.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

While hipfiring:
• 25 Stability
• 15 Aim Assist
• 2.7° Larger Precision Aim Angle
• -30% Accuracy Cone Size
• 20% Increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
• 20% Increased Damage Falloff Distance

The Damage Falloff Increase does not apply to The Last Word, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Fusion Rifles.
descriptions.zh-chs:
腰射时：
• +20%:
    • 瞄准辅助有效距离
    • 准星吸附有效距离
    • 有效射程距离
• -15% 精度锥角尺寸
• +15 瞄准辅助
• +2.7° 精准角度范畴
• +25 稳定性

有效射程距离系数不会作用于遗言、霰弹枪、狙击步枪、融合步枪。

descriptions.en:
Increases Damage against shielded targets:
• 125% Increase against PVE Combatant Shields
• 20% Increase against Player Overshields and for bodyshots against Players with Woven Mail

Combatant Shields include Barrier Champion Shields, Elemental Shields, and Lucent Moth/Shadow Legion [Tech Pack](https://www.destinypedia.com/Tech_Pack) Overshields.
descriptions.zh-chs:
对拥有覆盖护盾的目标造成额外伤害。

+20% 伤害对覆盖护盾。
+10% 伤害对战斗人员护盾。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Immediately upon firing, for 0.6 seconds:
40 Stability, -50% Recoil, and -10% Accuracy Cone Size.

Fusion Rifles Only Receive 25% of the benefits.

[Controller-Only] Weapon fires the instant trigger pressure is applied.
descriptions.zh-chs:
开火时：
+40 稳定性，-50% 最大后坐力，-10% 精度锥角尺寸，持续 0.6 秒。

融合步枪仅获得上述数值 25% 的增益。

[手柄] 轻触扳机键即会开火。

descriptions.en:
Passively Grants the following to Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
Superb handling. Move faster with this lightweight weapon equipped. This weapon grants additional speed benefits when MIDA Multi-Tool is also equipped.

Grants 30|50|60 Mobility with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

On Weapon kills while Super Ability is charged:
Grants 20 Discipline and 20 Strength for 12 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
超能能量全满时使用此武器完成最后一击：
在 12 秒内 +20 力量、+20 纪律。

descriptions.en:
Linearly increases Explosive Damage after 0.2 seconds of the grenade being in flight.

Reaches the maximum 25% Explosive Damage Increase after 1.1 seconds.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Blast Radius.

Weapon Kills grant 🡅11% Grenade Ability Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant 🡅22%.

Using your Grenade Ability refills the Magazine with a 3 second cooldown.

🡅 Grenade Ability Energy gains are increased by 10%. (e.g. 10%🠚11%)

Ability use grants Empowered for other abilities for 5 seconds, depending on the Ability used.
e.g.: Barricade Usage >> Empowered Melee and Empowered Grenade

Empowered Melee x1|x2:
• 10% | 20% Increased damage
• <:pve:922884406073507930>400% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>800% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[200%] Additional Base Melee Regeneration Rate

Empowered Grenade x1|x2:
• <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>35% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[20%] Increased damage
• <:pve:922884406073507930>400% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>800% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[200%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate

Empowered Barricade x1|x2:
• 25%|50% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate
• Currently does not grant a benefit to Barricade HP despite stating it does

When a Grenade Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Grenade Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Grenade Energy refunds.

Grenade Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

Weapon Kills apply <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile to other enemies in a 6.5 meter radius around the target.

? second cooldown after activation.

🡅 Cooldown is reduced.

Collecting <:arc:720178925317128243>Ionic Traces grants 2% Super Energy with Chaos Reach selected.

Chaos Reach refunds 10% Super Energy on hit.
0.75 second cooldown between refunds.

This can increase Chaos Reach Duration by ~120%.
descriptions.zh-chs:
混沌之触每次命中回复 10% 的超能能量。
每次回复有 0.75秒 冷却时间。可以增加最多 100% 的超能持续时间。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants:
• 100 Handling
• 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier
• 🡅-50%(?) Auto Aim Cone Size (No effect on Reticle Stickiness)

🡅 Auto Aim Penalty is decreased by an additive 5%(?).

Splits off 55% of the Weapon's Bodyshot Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that deals 30% Increased Damage in PvE and isn't affected by Damage Falloff.

Payload detonates after a 0.6 second delay.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PvE] Total damage is increased by ~16.5% of the weapon's Bodyshot Damage. On Crits, the overall increase is 10.9% for Adaptive/Precision Hand Cannons and 10.17% for Aggressive Hand Cannons.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PvP] Total damage remains roughly the same.
descriptions.zh-chs:
将 55% 的武器伤害转化为增伤 30% 的爆炸伤害，该部分伤害不会因距离衰减。爆炸在 0.6 秒后产生。

[PVE] 身体伤害提高 16%。 精准伤害将根据武器精准伤害系数变化。

[PVP] 总伤害不变。

descriptions.en:
Upon readying the Weapon, for 1 second:
Grants 100 Ready/Stow Handling, and 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier.

Buff goes away as soon as ADS input is pressed.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.
Refills 1 round into the Magazine from reserves upon blocking damage. 1 second cooldown after activation.

5% Increased Damage against PvE Combatant Shields.

Bullets are able to overpenetrate enemies once.
descriptions.es:
Otorga de forma pasiva:
+5 al Alcance
+5% al Daño contra escudos de enemigos

Las balas son capaces de penetrar enemigos 1 vez
descriptions.zh-chs:
增加 5% 对战斗人员护盾的伤害。

子弹可以穿透敌人一次。

descriptions.en:
Thunderclap Kills refund Melee Energy based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• 9%: Tier 1 Minors
• 13%: Tier 2 Minors, Tier 1 Elites
• 15%: Enemy Players
• 20%: Tier 3 Minors, Tier 2 Elites
• 30%: Tier 4 Minors, Tier 3 Elites
• 40%: Tier 4 Elites, Minibosses
• 50%: Bosses

Thunderclap strikes enemies within ? meters with lightning, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>200 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[50] damage. Lightning Damage is increased by 50% while <:arc:720178925317128243>Amplified.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Weapons matching your Subclass Element with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Weapons Kills with a Matching Subclass Element grant a Stack of Death Throes for 11 seconds. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Death Throes grants 50% additional Base Grenade Recharge Rate and 20% Increased Grenade Damage per Stack.

On Grenade Ability Usage with active Death Throes Stacks, for 5 seconds:
Allies receive 'Feel The Flames' while within 20 meters.

'Feel the Flames' grants 10x Grenade Recharge Rate.
Grenade Regeneration Rate Multiplier is applied after all Additive Grenade Regeneration Rate Modifiers.

Upon breaking a Combatant's Elemental Shield or a Guardian's Shield while in Super:
Grants a 30 HP Overshield for 🡅11.4 seconds.

🡅 Increases the Overshield duration by 1.4 seconds.

Increases Weapon Damage by <:pve:922884406073507930>12.1% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3%] to <:pve:922884406073507930>25.6% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6%] as Magazine drops from 🡅55% capacity to empty.

The buff in PVE ranges between 10.3% and 22.9% instead on Fusion Rifles and Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles.

Activation Condition is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.

🡅 Activates with 5% more of the Magazine Capacity remaining.
Direct hits do more damage to combatant shields. Dealing damage increases reload speed. Rapid final blows against grenade-damaged combatants refill the magazine.

Upon finishing a reload within 6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
Overflows Magazine from reserves based on the amount of kills scored within 7 seconds of each.

Maxes out at 150% Increased Magazine Capacity. Always rounds magazine up.

Magazine Capacity Increase per Kill:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 20%
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 10%.
descriptions.es:
Luego de recargar despues de  [?] segundos despues de una Baja con el arma:
Aumenta la capacidad del Cargador por baja dentro de [?] segundos

Puede llegar a ser un 150% la cantidad del cargador original. Redondea hacia arriba.

Armas Primarias reciben un 20% a la capacidad aumentada por baja. Armas Especiales y Pesadas reciben un 10%

Aumentado: Otorga +5 a la velocidad de recarga de forma pasiva
descriptions.zh-chs:
该武器击杀后 7 秒内换弹：
7 秒内的每个击杀都可过量填加弹匣，

最高过量填加 50%，计算结果向上取整。

<:primary:968793055677251604> 主武器：每个击杀过量填加 20%。
<:special:968793055631114330> 特殊武器和 <:heavy:968793055652106320> 重武器：每个击杀过量填加 10%。

descriptions.en:
Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

While moving at a minimum of 2 meters per second:
Gain a Stack after 2 and 🡅9 seconds.

Each stack provides 10 Stability, 10 Handling, and 10 Reload Speed. All stacks are removed if movement speed is below 2 m/s for 0.5 seconds.

Works and can activate while stowed.

🡅 Second Stack is gained 1 second sooner.
Insectoid robot grenades quickly repopulate the magazine from reserves while the Colony is unequipped.

Taking Damage while Guarding with a Sword grants Class Ability Energy:
• 1.5% for every point of Melee Damage Blocked
• 1% for every point of "other" Damage Blocked
• 0.5% for every point of Non-Blocked Damage (getting hit from behind)
descriptions.zh-chs:
格挡伤害时：
根据伤害量获取职业技能能量。

可获取大量能量。

descriptions.en:
Grants Melee Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Melee Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>12% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>17% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[8.5%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%]

Upon scoring a Kill or hitting every shot in a burst:
Grants 20% Increased Damage and 10% Decreased Charge Time for 2 seconds.

🡅 Currently doesn't grant any measurable benefits.

Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine and grants 20 Stability and 20 Handling for 3 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
滑行时：
重新装填 15% 弹匣，+20 稳定性，+20 操控性，持续 3 秒或直到开枪。发多次该特性效果。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills apply <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile to other enemies in a 6.5 meter radius around the target.

? second cooldown after activation.

Grants 20 Stability, 60 Handling, and 60 Reload Speed while Grenade, Melee, and Class Abilities are all uncharged.

Swords receive 50 Charge Rate and 40 Guard Endurance instead.
Fires a long-range precision energy bolt. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Kinetic Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Upon readying a sword, for 1 second:
80% Increased Grounded and 64% Increased Airborne Lunge Distance.

Deactivates after swinging once. 3 second cooldown.
descriptions.zh-chs:
切换到此武器时：
提升 100% 刀剑前冲距离，持续 1 秒。

移动速度过快时将立即结束该效果。

冷却时间 4 秒。

descriptions.en: When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
• 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 50% Flinch Resistance
• 30 Stability
• 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing right next to the barricade also consistently prevents emeny melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Precision hits drain combatants' life force and charge up a ball of darkness. [Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to unleash the blight projectile, shrouding combatants in darkness and temporarily blinding them.
High damage, high recoil.

Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Weapon fires Full Auto. (Identical to the setting)

Grants 10% Faster Rate of Fire on Shotguns.
descriptions.zh-chs:
扣住扳机时将以全自动模式进行射击。

使用霰弹枪时会提高 10% 射速。

descriptions.en:
Void Invisibility effects last 2 seconds longer.

While Invisible:
• Grants 100 Recovery and 100 Reload Speed
• <:pve:922884406073507930>400% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] Additional Base Melee Regeneration Rate.
• 1 to 2+ enemies within 15 meters will increase the bonus to a total of <:pve:922884406073507930>600% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[200%] and <:pve:922884406073507930>800% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[300%]

Hits and Kills with your Weapon grant you 'Points'. Hitting Point thresholds grants Stacks of Field Test.

Maximum of 5 Stacks. Buff is only removed on death.

Stat Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Field Test Stacks:
• 3|6|9|12|20 Range
• 5|10|20|35|55 Reload Speed
• (?) Stability and Handling
• 5|10|20|35|55 Charge Rate (Swords)
• 5|10|20|30|40 Guard Resistance (Swords)

Points required for 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 51|151|351|651|1001
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 26|76|176|326|501
• <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 11|31|71|131|201

Each Damage Instance (Weapon Hit) grants 1 Point regardless of Weapon Archetype and Enemy Rank.

Points granted by Kills are based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1-2 Minors: 1 Point
• Tier 3-4 Minors, Tier 2+ Elites, and higher: 4 Points
• Tier 1 Elites: 5 Points
• Enemy Players: 10 Points

Kill Point Multipliers by Weapon Archetype:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons and Shotguns: 5x
• Breech-Loaded Grenade Launchers: 2x
Bonus damage against Taken enemies and Gambit invaders.

Increases Super Energy Gains from Grenade Kills based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) with 1|2|3 Mods equipped:
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 1%|?|?
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: ?|?|?
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: ?|?|?
• T4 Minors, T3-T4 Elites, and higher: 5%|?|?
• Players: ?|?|?

Bonus Super Energy gains from Grapple Melee Kills are reduced by 50%.

Grenade Ability usage and Powered Melee hits grant 1 Stack of Well-Rounded. Super Ability usage grants 2 Stacks.

Grants 🡅12 Range, 🡅12 Stability, and 🡅12 Handling per stack for 15 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.

🡅 Stat bonuses are increased by 2.

Grants <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Increased Damage to targets standing on 1? meter lower ground than you.

Does not work while airborne.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.
Hard-hitting two-burst fire.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Upon readying the weapon within 3.5 seconds of getting kills with other weapons while it was stowed:
Grants 10 Handling, 10 Reload Speed, and 10 Stability per Stack for 7.5 seconds.

Maximum of 3 Stacks. Buff is removed on stow.
descriptions.zh-chs:
此武器收起时使用武器或技能完成最后一击，并在 3.5 秒内拔出此武器：
每层增益 +10 操控性，+10 填装速度，+10 稳定性，持续 7.5 秒。

最多叠加 3 层。收枪时移除该增益。

descriptions.en:
Finishing a reload within 5.3 seconds of a Weapon Kill grants Voltshot for 7 seconds.

While Voltshot is active, your next Weapon Hit applies <:arc:720178925317128243>Jolt and consumes the buff.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 3 秒内进行填装：
7 秒内的下一次武器命中会震颤敌人。

此次震颤的伤害量可以通过其他增益效果提升。

descriptions.en: Allies within 18 meters receive 1 Armor Charge on Orb of Power Pickup.

Proximity Explosive Knife applies 60 Scorch on detonation. (Unaffected by Ember of Ashes)
Proximity Explosive Knife kills cause an ignition.

Grants 500% Additional Base Melee Recharge Rate while Proximity Knife remains unexploded.
descriptions.zh-chs:
感应飞刀在爆炸时施加 60 层灼烧。
如果使用感应飞刀直接击中击杀敌人，则会触发点燃效果。

感应飞刀未爆炸时，近战技能基础冷却速度增加 500%。

descriptions.en:
While in Spectral Blades:
Refunds Super Energy on Heavy Attack based on the number of Spectral Blade Kills.

Super Energy Refund after 1|2|3|4|5+ kills:
<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 11.1% | 14.3% | 16.5% | 16.9% | 17.1%
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 8.3% | 12.5% | 14.2% | 15.8% | 16.7%
descriptions.zh-chs:
在超能鬼灵利刃期间：
根据重攻击的击杀数量，恢复超能能量。

基于击杀数量的超能能量增长（%）
PVE: 11.1 🠚 14.3 🠚 16.5 🠚 16.9 🠚 17.1
PVP: 8.3 🠚 12.5 🠚 14.2 🠚 15.8 🠚 16.7

descriptions.en: Grants an extra Class Ability Charge.
Immediately Starts Health Regeneration on Orb of Power Pickups.

Grants 1 Armor Charges to Allies within 21 meters on Super Cast. Allies on a different Subclass Element are granted 2 Charges.

Caster receives 1 Armor Charge if already charged.

On Kinetic Damage Precision Kills:
• Creates an Elemental Explosion matching your Subclass Element on enemy death location, dealing up to <:pve:922884406073507930>280 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100] damage over a ? meter radius.
• Applies a debuff based on your selected Subclass in a ? meter radius.

Debuffs applied by Subclass:
• <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc: Blinds for <:pve:922884406073507930>? <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] seconds
• <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar: Applies 15 Scorch (20 with Ember of Ashes)
• <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis: Applies 30 Slow Stacks
• Strand: Severs for <:pve:922884406073507930>? <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] seconds
• <:void:720178940240461864>Void: Weakens for <:pve:922884406073507930>? <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] seconds
descriptions.zh-chs:
动能武器取得精准最后一击时：
敌人释放出与当前所选职业相匹配的元素爆炸，造成最多 <:pve:922884406073507930>210 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[200] 伤害。

爆炸半径和衰减距离会根据武器的射程属性有细微的改变。

descriptions.en:
Grants Super Energy on kills while inside your <:solar:720178909361995786>Well of Radiance and below 50% Super Energy.

Amount of Super Energy gained is reduced by 1.5% for each successive kill, down to a minimum of 4% Super Energy per kill:
10% 🠚 8.5% 🠚 7% 🠚 5.5% 🠚 4% 🠚 4% ...

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.

Upon breaking a Combatant's Elemental Shield or a Guardian's Shield while in Super:
Grants a 30 HP Overshield for 10 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
打破战斗人员或正在使用超能的守护者的护盾时：
获得一个持续 10 秒，30 生命值的覆盖护盾。

descriptions.en:
Increases Weapon Damage by <:pve:922884406073507930>12.1% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3%] to <:pve:922884406073507930>25.6% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6%] as Magazine drops from 50% capacity to empty.

The buff in PVE ranges between 10.3% and 22.9% instead on Fusion Rifles and Aggressive Frame Linear Fusion Rifles.

Activation Condition is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.
Superb handling. Move faster with this lightweight weapon equipped. This weapon grants additional speed benefits when MIDA Multi-Tool is also equipped.

Passively Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

On Elemental, Barrier or Guardian Shield Break:
Weakens the enemy, increasing Kinetic Damage dealt by 50% for 5.5 seconds.

🡅 Debuff Duration is increased.

Weapon Kills grant 2 Stacks of Shot Swap, granting 100(?) Ready/Stow Handling.

Maximum of 8 Stacks. Consumes 1 Stack when readying or stowing the weapon.

🡅 Stronger effect.

Upon blocking damage with the Glaive Shield:
20% increased Projectile Damage for 4 seconds or until no longer blocking.

Blocking any hit refreshes the duration.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用偃月格挡伤害后：
+20% 弹头伤害，持续 4 秒，或直到停止格挡。

格挡任意伤害可刷新持续时间。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier
Kills with Drang reload this weapon and overflow a bonus damage round into the magazine.

30% Increased Glaive Melee Damage for 🡅11 seconds upon scoring a Glaive Projectile Kill.

Dealing Projectile or Melee Damage extends the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to 🡅11 seconds.

Persists through stow.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Upon Blocking a Melee Attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
Suppresses and weakens the enemy, making them receive 20% increased damage for 4 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
格挡后 0.5 秒内受到近战伤害：
抑制并虚弱该名敌人，使他受到额外 20% 伤害，持续 4 秒。

descriptions.en: Grants a 200 HP Overshield for the duration of your Finisher Animation.

Increases <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

If no allies are within 15 meters:
• 2.5% Reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty
• 0.85x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内没有盟友的情况下瞄准：
-2.5% 移动速度惩罚
[0.85x?] 瞄准动画系数

descriptions.en:
Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to Strand Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain an additional perk.

Heal allies with Noble Rounds to unlock this upgrade.

After being in Combat for 6 seconds:
Grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness and 35% Flinch Resistance for 10 seconds.

Can activate while stowed. Dealing and receiving damage refreshes the buff duration.

For Pefect Float, being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 3 seconds.

While Crouching:
• Doubles Radar Resoltion (6🠚12 Sectors)
• Prevents Crouch Speed from being decreased below 4 meters per second

Upon <:void:720178940240461864>Suppressing an enemy:
• Refills readied weapon from reserves
• Grants 30 mobility for 10 seconds
• Increases Forward Movement Speed by 4% for 10s

Cannot be reactivated while the buff is active.

Killing <:void:720178940240461864>Suppressed enemies spawns a <:void:720178940240461864>Void Breach.

Dealing Grenade Ability Damage grants Melee Energy once per Damage Instance.

DoT (Damage Over Time) grenades only provide Melee Energy once per damage tick regardless of the number of enemies hit. Other grenades only grant Melee Energy once per submunition.

Melee Energy granted per Damage Instance:
• 3%: Void Spike, Void Wall, Scatter Grenade, and Vortex Grenade
• 8%: Axion Bolt, Suppressor Grenade, and Magnetic Grenade (including when used with the <:void:720178940240461864>Chaos Accelerant aspect)
<:void:720178940240461864>Void Ability Kills cause enemies to explode, dealing up to <:pve:922884406073507930>160 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[130] damage in a 7 meter radius.

Extends the duration of lingering Grenade Abilities:
• Axion Bolt track enemies for ?% longer
• Void Spike lasts 40% longer
• Void Wall lasts 60% longer
• Vortex Grenade lasts 50% longer

Melee Kills grant Grenade Energy based on the [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) of the killed target:
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 7.5%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 11%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites, Players: 16.25%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%

While 3+ enemies are within 8 meters:
• Kills grant an additional ?% Super Energy.
• Each enemy after the 3rd, up to the 7th further grants an additional ?% Super Energy each.

1 second cooldown between activations.
Melee Kills start Health Regeneration for you and allies within ? meters.
<:void:720178940240461864>Void Invisibility, <:void:720178940240461864>Void Overshield, and Devour buffs applied to you generally last 40% longer.

Orb of Power pickups grant 1 Stack of Explosive Light, granting 100 Blast Radius and Increased Damage.

Consumes 1 Stack per Shot. Maximum of 🡅7 Stacks.

Rocket Launchers: 25% Increased Impact and Explosive Damage. (No effect on Wolfpack Rounds)

Grenade Launchers: Increases Explosive Damage damage by 60%.

🡅 Maximum number of Stacks is increased by 1.

Increases Magazine Capacity by 1 and Total Reserve Size by 5. Decreases Firing Delay by 25%.

Decreases Blast Radius by 🡅25, Reload Speed by 🡅15, and Damage by 25%.

🡅 Stat penalties are reduced by 5.

Increases <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.
Randomly grants 10% to 50% Increased Magazine Capacity upon reloading. Always rounds up.
descriptions.zh-chs:
装填时：
随机过量装填弹匣容量 10% ~ 50% 的弹药。
数值向上取整。

descriptions.en: Piercing arrowhead that damages the target on entry and exit. One shot can overpenetrate multiple targets.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Strand Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Kinetic Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.
Collecting an Orb of Power grants a period of maximum power that starts with an automatic reload. Sustained fire in this mode suppresses targets.

Grants the following while Crouched:
• 🡅55 Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
• 0.8x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier

Passively grants 🡅40 Inventory Size Stat. (Equivalent of 2 Reserve Armor Mods)

🡅 Grants 5 more Reload Speed and 10 more Inventory Size Stat.

Refills 4% of the Magazine of Trace Rifles from reserves every 0.7 seconds. Works while stowed.

Rapidly scoring 5 Trace Rifle hits on a [Miniboss, Champion, Boss, or Vehicle](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) marks them for 10 seconds. Additional hits refresh the mark duration.

Only one target can be marked at a time and the mark cannot be transferred to a different target unless the duration runs out or the enemy is defeated.

Ally kills on Marked Enemies generate <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Ammo for Allies and <:special:968793055631114330>Special Ammo for the Wearer.

Multiple people can mark the same target resulting in each of them receiving the appropriate drops.

Spawned Ammo Bricks grant 10.33% of your total reserves (rounded up to the nearest whole number).

Increases Kinetic Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Increased Damage to targets standing on 1? meter lower ground than you.

Does not work while airborne.

Increases <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

While Aiming Down Sights with Kinetic Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.
Reloading immediately after a kill increases weapon damage for a short time.
Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

On Barricade Placement:
Unleashes a <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Wave that returns back to the Barricade after traveling 18.5 meters.

The Wave deals <:pve:922884406073507930>240 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100] damage and applies <:pve:922884406073507930>60 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[30] <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch when returning (unaffected by Ember of Ashes).

<:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Kills grant 25% Class Ability Energy.

After dealing non-projectile Melee Damage:
50% Increased Damage, 30 Reload Speed, and 30 Handling for 5 seconds OR until firing 3 shots.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat combatants while using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Defeating high-tier Wrathborn with any weapon or ability will unlock this objective significantly faster.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot deploy a protective shield on impact.
Kills with this weapon heal the wielder. Precision kills also refill the magazine.

Weapon Hits grant 1 Stack of the perk for 1 second up to the maximum of 5 Stacks.

Benefits granted per Stack:
• Grants ?% Flinch Resistance
• Reduces Visual Weapon Shake 34%
• Reduces Reticle Bounce by 34%

Stacks gained per Weapon Hit by weapon type:
• Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 2
• Pulse Rifles, Sidearms: 1.5
• Other Weapons: 1
descriptions.zh-chs:
连续命中时：
降低最大后坐力角度、武器晃动。
最高叠加 5 层，持续 1 秒。

使用手柄时移除准星抖动。

descriptions.en: This weapon's magazine is automatically reloaded when you gain Devour, a Void overshield, or become invisible.

Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine and grants 🡅25 Stability and 🡅25 Handling for 3 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.

🡅 Stat bonuses are increased by 5.

On Weapon Kill:
Triggers an explosion matching the weapon's element that deals <:pve:922884406073507930>84 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[56] damage over a 3 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).
descriptions.zh-chs: 武器击杀会触发一次元素爆炸。

descriptions.en: When fully drawn, the bolt creates a large concussive blast that knocks combatants back.

Upon scoring 50% of Magazine as Precision Hits:
20% increased damage for 🡅12 seconds.

Duration can be refreshed by scoring enough precision hits.

Stowing or Reloading resets the Precision Hit counter but the buff remains active while stowed.

Activation Condition is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Kinetic Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Class Ability Usage while within 15 metres of an enemy grants Super Ability Energy.

Super Energy Gains with 1|2+ Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>2.5% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.25%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>4% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2.4%]

Energy Multipliers based on Class:
Hunters: x1 | Titans: x1.2 | Warlocks: x2

On Weapon Kill, for 7 seconds:
• 30 Stability
• 1.45x Damage Falloff Start and End Distance
• 3-3.5° Precision Aim Angle
• -95%? Accuracy Cone Size
• -95%? Accuracy Cone Growth.

Only applies to hipfiring.
Hard-hitting four-burst fire.

Grants a Stacking Damage Buff and 20 Handling for 🡅5 seconds on Weapon or Grenade Kills. Grenade Kills grant all 5 stacks.

Damage Buff Stacks: 6.7%|13.3%|20%|26.6%|33.3%

Buff duration is refreshed on Weapon or Grenade Kills.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Class Ability Usage changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

Kinetic Weapons lose their Kinetic Damage Bonus in PVE (10% on <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary, 15% on <:special:968793055631114330>Special).

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles, Swords, and Grand Overture.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Upon scoring 4 Hipfire Hits within 4? seconds of each, for 4 seconds:
• 20 Handling
• 20 Reload Speed
• 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier
• Additive 5% Reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty

Replaces Grenade Ability with Barri-Nade on Class Ability Usage. Barri-Nade is lost if Class Ability fully recharges.

Barri-Nade spawns your selected Barricade type on the impact location and inherits the benefits of Aspects such as Bastion and Drengr's Lash. Non-barricade class abilities default to Towering Barricade and match its cooldown.

Enemies within 5? meters of the Barri-Nade's impact location are disoriented. Spawned Barricade deals no Contact Damage within 2 seconds of its creation.

Barri-nade has no collision with enemies.

Spawns an Orb of Power on Powered Melee Kills. 10 second cooldown between activations.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 0.8%|1.1%|1.25%|1.5% Super Energy with 1|2|3|4 Mods equipped. (4 Mods is only achievable through Exotic Armor)

On Weapon Kill, for 5 seconds:
• 50 Mobility
• 40 Handling and 20 Range
• 5% Increased Damage Falloff Distance

Additional Kills extend the duration by 5 seconds, up to 8 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
+50 敏捷，+20 射程，+40 操控性，+5% 伤害衰减距离。

持续 5 秒，额外击杀增加 5 秒，持续时间上限为 8 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants 20 Range while your shields are active (above 70 HP).

Getting your shields broken disables the buff. Reactivates ? seconds after your shields fully recharge.
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提升 +20 射程。
受到伤害后 5 秒内失去上述增益。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Upon finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
17% | 33% | 50% Increased damage for 5 seconds, depending on the amount of enemies killed within 3.5 seconds of each.

Each kill within the time period contributes to 1 Stack of the buff. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

Buff is overwritten every time it is refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
击杀后 3.8 秒内换弹：
根据 [?] 秒内的击杀数量，增加 17% | 33% | 50% 伤害，持续 5 秒。

增益可以被刷新。

descriptions.en:
After dealing non-projectile Melee Damage:
50% Increased Damage, 🡅35 Reload Speed, and 🡅35 Handling for 5 seconds OR until firing 3 shots.

🡅 Stat bonuses are increased by 5?.

Passively Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
Superb handling. Move faster with this lightweight weapon equipped. This weapon grants additional speed benefits when MIDA Multi-Tool is also equipped.

While on <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Subclass:
Barricade is replaced by a <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystal Wall that lasts 14 seconds. <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Wall is made of 4 Medium Crystals and a Small Crystal in the middle.

Applies Rally Barricade Bonuses to players standing behind the middle Crystal for the entire duration, even if destroyed. Overrides Class Ability Cooldown with Towering Barricade's.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Weapons matching your Subclass Element with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.
Periodically generates Ionic Traces while in its high-damage state.

<:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Ammo Weapons deal 100% Increased Damage against <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystals and 50% Increased Damage against <:stasis:915198000727461909>Frozen Enemies.

Also applies to Fighting Lion, Revision Zero, Vex Mythoclast, and their alternate fire modes.

<:stasis:915198000727461909>Frozen enemies normally receive <:pve:922884406073507930>5% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[50%] decreased damage from <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons. Using the fragment results in a 42.5% overall Damage Increase in PVE and a 25% overall Decrease in PVP.
<:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Shards within 15 meters are slowly pulled to you after a 1 second delay.

Small <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Shards restore 5 HP, <:stasis:915198000727461909>Large Shards restore 35?. If at Full Health, it is instead added as a <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Overshield that can have up to 50 HP.

<:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Shards grant increased Melee Energy:
• Small Shards: 10% 🠚 17.5%
• Large Shards: 50% 🠚 75%

Spawns an Orb of Power on Grenade Kills. 10 second cooldown between activations.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 0.8%|1.1%|1.25% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants 🡅35 Handling and 🡅45 Reload Speed while within 15 meters of an ally.

Lingers for 1.5 seconds.

🡅 Stat bonuses are increased by 5.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing right next to the barricade also consistently prevents emeny melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
• 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 50% Flinch Resistance
• 30 Stability
• 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Scoring 2 to 3 <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Kills within 10 seconds of each grants 1 Stack of <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapon Surge for <:pve:922884406073507930>11 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6] seconds. Further Solar Kills while at the maximum of 4 Stacks refresh the buff's duration.

Being <:stasis:915198000727461909>Frozen or scoring a Kill with any <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Grenade grants all 4 Stacks. These do not (reliably) work in PvE for whatever reason.

Slow Stacks and Duration are halved. Damage from <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Breakout is removed.

Stasis Breakout creates a burst of Solar Energy, dealing up to 105 damage over a 9 meter radius.

Firing or swinging the weapon gradually grants increasing benefits to the weapon:
• Up to 10 Range
• Up to -?% Accuracy Cone Size
• Up to ?% Increased Lunge Distance (Swords)
• Up to ?% Increased Projectile Velocity (Launchers)

Deactivates after not firing or swinging for 2 seconds.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Increases <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Upon dealing Melee Damage while an Enemy is within 15 meters:
<:pve:922884406073507930>500% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] Increased Damage and 100 Handling for 🡅11 seconds or until firing a full burst.

4 second cooldown after buff expires. Can be activated while stowed.

Any Powered Melee which requires sprinting, sliding, or performs a slam will not activate the perk.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.

On Weapon Kill against an enemy affected by a Void Debuff:
Grants a 45 HP Void Overshield for 🡅10 seconds.

🡅 Overshield Duration is increased by 2 seconds.

After 1.5 seconds of Aiming Down Sights without firing, for one shot:
• 10% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
• Increases Precision Multiplier by 1 (e.g. 1.5x🠚2.5x)

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

The precision damage of Scout Rifles is decreased by 5% while Box Breathing is active. (This part of the perk is inconsistent and often doesn't get applied)
descriptions.zh-chs:
未射击下瞄准 1.5 秒：
+10% 瞄准辅助衰减距离，并提高下一发子弹精准命中伤害（伤害系数+1）。
按下瞄准键即开始计时。

伤害提升值：
斥候步枪：+62.75% (1.6x -> 2.6x)
狙击步枪：+33.22% (3x -> 4x)
线性融合步枪：+29% (3.44x -> 4.44x)

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants less than 4 meters away by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Elemental Pickup Interactions grant <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Increased Damage for 7 seconds.

Additional Pickup Interactions extend the duration by 7 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

Elemental Pickup Interactions:
• Throwing Strand Tangles or Elemental Orbs
• Collecting <:solar:720178909361995786>Firesprites, <:arc:720178925317128243>Ionic Traces, <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Shards, or <:void:720178940240461864>Void Breaches

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

After crouching for 2+ seconds before standing up:
Grants ? Handling and 10 Reload Speed for 5 seconds.

Upon finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
17% | 33% | 50% Increased damage for 🡅5.5 seconds, depending on the amount of enemies killed within 3.5 seconds of each.

Each kill within the time period contributes to 1 Stack of the buff. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

Buff is overwritten every time it is refreshed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the Maximum Number of Armor Charge Stacks you can hold from 3 to 4|5|6 with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Weapon Kills grant 2 Stacks of Shot Swap, granting 100(?) Ready/Stow Handling.

Maximum of 8 Stacks. Consumes 1 Stack when readying or stowing the weapon.
Swords are refunded 1 Ammo after every other Powered Kill.
descriptions.zh-chs: 每隔一次的赋能刀剑击杀提供 1 发刀剑弹药。

descriptions.en:
Upon scoring a Kill or hitting every shot in a burst:
Grants 20% Increased Damage and 10% Decreased Charge Time for 2 seconds.

Spawns a <:special:968793055631114330>Special Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.66% to 1.8%. Average of 57.25 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 3.25x
• Exotic <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 4.75x
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 1.1x

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

Increases Damage by 15% for 7 seconds on Weapon Kills.

Matching Grenade or Powered Melee Kills while the buff is active grant 50% Increased Damage for 10 seconds.

The 50% Damage Buff's duration can only be refreshed by getting another Matching Ability Kill.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
+15% 伤害，持续 7 秒。

此增益生效期间，相同伤害类型的手雷或近战击杀会 +50% 伤害，并延长持续时间 10 秒。
持续时间仅可被另一种技能击杀刷新。

descriptions.en:
While Super is not charged:
Kills with Weapons matching your Subclass Element grant Energy Siphon for 2 seconds. (Essentially a Cooldown)
Energy Siphon grants <:pve:922884406073507930>3% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.45%] Super Energy.

While Super is charged:
Kills with Weapons matching your Subclass Element grant 4 Stacks of Subclass-Matching Weapon Surge for <:pve:922884406073507930>11 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6] seconds.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Change this weapon's damage type, cycling between Solar, Arc, and Void.

Grants 30 Handling and 40 Reload Speed while within 15 meters of an ally.

Lingers for 1.5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内有 1 个以上敌人时：
+30 操控性，+40 填装速度。

线性持续 1.5 秒。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Grants an extra Melee Ability Charge.

Acts as a copy of the Heavy Handed armor mod.
descriptions.zh-chs:
获得额外一次近战技能充能。
近战技能数量上限为 2。

descriptions.en: Thrown Grenades travel 25% faster.

On Weapon Kill, for 6 seconds:
37.5% Decreased Charge/Draw Time.

Kills while the perk active add 4 seconds to the duration up to a maximum of 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
+37.5% 充能/拉弓速度，持续 6 秒。

增益触发时完成击杀，增加 4 秒持续时间，最高 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants Stat Bonuses depending on the number of Charged Abilities.

Stat Bonuses with 1|2|3+ Charged Abilities:
• 5|15|25 Stability
• 5|25|60 Handling
• 10|25|60 Reload Speed

🡅 Stronger Effect.

Grenade Kills grant <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile Rounds for 10 seconds, making hits with Void Weapons apply <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile.

(<:void:720178940240461864>Volatile explosions do not count as damage originating from your weapon)

Killing <:void:720178940240461864>Weakened enemies spawns a <:void:720178940240461864>Void Breach and an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.
Finishers grant <:void:720178940240461864>Void Invisibility for 4.8 seconds.
Picking up an Orb of Power or <:void:720178940240461864>Void Breach grants <:void:720178940240461864>Devour for 5 seconds.
Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

Dealing Ability Damage to a [Major, Boss, or Player](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) target grants 4 Stacks of Subclass-Matching Weapon Surge and highlights the target for 10 seconds each. Weapon Surge duration is not refreshable.

Killing highlighted targets spawns a Subclass-Matching Elemental Pickup.

Elemental Pickups include <:solar:720178909361995786>Firesprites, <:arc:720178925317128243>Ionic Traces, <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Shards, Strand Tangles, and <:void:720178940240461864>Void Breaches.
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提供 +20 空中效率。

准星悬停在敌人附近 1 秒后，标记敌人 5 秒。
标记穿墙可见。

如果敌人血量低于 30%：
提供低于 30% 对应百分数的伤害提高。
（例如：剩 10% 的血量 -> 伤害增加 20%）

伤害提高适用于所有造成的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Modifies <:solar:720178909361995786>Golden Gun to only fire a single shot that deals 650% Increased Damage. (~72.1% more Damage compared to 3 Precision Hits with Marksman Golden Gun. Also, please only use it with Marksman Golden Gun)

Scoring a Golden Gun Kill refunds 33% Super Energy and causes the enemy to explode, dealing up to <:pve:922884406073507930>400 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] damage to enemies within ? meters.

Precision Kills grant 1.5-4.5% Super Energy depending on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants).
descriptions.zh-chs:
黄金枪每次激活只能开一枪。

黄金枪造成 500% 额外伤害。
（比使用射手黄金枪精确命中 3 次造成的伤害高 37%）。

击杀敌人时返还 33% 的超能能量。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness and radar remains active while Aiming-Down-Sights.

Crouching grants Enhanced Radar (6🠚12 sectors)

Hovering your reticle near enemies for 1 second marks them for 5 seconds. Markers stay visible even behind walls.

If Enemy is below 30% HP:
Grants 1% increased Weapon and Ability Damage for every percentage point below 30%.
(10% HP left 🠚 20% Increased Damage)

Combatant and Player Shields do not count as Health. (In other words, it only activates against Players once they are below 21 HP)
Superb handling. Move faster with this lightweight weapon equipped. This weapon grants additional speed benefits when MIDA Multi-Tool is also equipped.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Applies 30 <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch Stacks (🡅<:pve:922884406073507930>45 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[40] with <:solar:720178909361995786>Ember of Ashes) and deals up to ? damage to enemies within 4? meters of the target on Weapon Kills.

Killing Powerful Combatants and Players increases the radius to 8 meters.

<:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch damage can be increased through [Weapon Damage Buffs](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs).

🡅 Applies to 5 more <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch Stacks to PVE Combatants when Ember of Ashes is equipped.

On Weapon Kill:
Grants 🡅9% Ability Energy split equally amongst all uncharged abilities.

Abilities with multiple charges only receive one third of the ability energy normally split to them once they have a full ability charge ready.

🡅 Ability Energy Gain is increased by 12.5%. (8%🠚9%)

Increases Melee Damage by 100% for 1.22 seconds after hitting a target with all 12 Shotgun Pellets in the spread.

Against [Bosses and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants), this is increased to 150% for the following melee options:
All Unpowered Melees, <:arc:720178925317128243>Combination Blow, <:arc:720178925317128243>Disorienting Blow, <:arc:720178925317128243>Chain Lightning, and Grapple Melee

The following options do not benefit from the perk:
• Hunters: <:solar:720178909361995786>Proximity Explosive Knife's and <:void:720178940240461864>Snare Bomb's detonations, <:arc:720178925317128243>Tempest Strike, <:stasis:915198000727461909>Withering Blade, Threaded Spike
• Titans: <:solar:720178909361995786>Throwing Hammer, <:solar:720178909361995786>Consecration, <:arc:720178925317128243>Thunderclap, <:void:720178940240461864>Shield Throw, Flechette Storm
• Warlocks: all abilities except <:arc:720178925317128243>Chain Lightning

The buff does not stack with the passive Melee Damage Increase against <:stasis:915198000727461909>Frozen non-Boss targets. The [higher buff of the two](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1N_zEcw3-pGL2jGUCGaAHjoKEr_VIbDc7-UWel-DGmys/) takes precedence.

This means that with the exception of <:stasis:915198000727461909>Shiver Strike and <:stasis:915198000727461909>Howl of the Storm in PVE where the perk's buff is always higher, it will only provide a benefit over the buff from <:stasis:915198000727461909>Freeze against Bosses and Vehicles.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当一发弹药的 12 枚弹片全部命中时：
在 1.22 秒内增加近战伤害。

未充能近战：+100% 伤害。
充能近战：+40% 伤害。

对首领和载具时，再增加 25% 伤害。和上述增伤乘法叠加。

descriptions.en:
Upon picking up <:special:968793055631114330>Special or <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Ammo:
Magazine gets refilled and overflowed from reserves.

Maxes out at 🡅120% Increased Magazine Capacity. Activates even if stowed.

🡅 Maximum overflow amount is increased by 20%.

Hybrid melee/ranged polearm with a frontal shield.
Generates energy on dealing ranged damage.

[Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield, depleting energy over time
[Melee]  : Kinetic melee combo

Grants 10 Aim Assist while Aiming Down Sights and reduces the ADS Movement Speed Penalty by an additive 2.5%.

🡅 Aim Assist bonus is slightly increased.

Passively Grants the following to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing right next to the barricade also consistently prevents emeny melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
• 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 50% Flinch Resistance
• 30 Stability
• 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with an <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Weapon Kills grant an additional 1% Super Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant an additional 1.5% instead.
descriptions.zh-chs:
<:primary:968793055677251604> 主武器 或 <:heavy:968793055652106320> 威能武器击杀提供额外 1%  超能充能。
<:special:968793055631114330> 特殊武器击杀提供额外 1.5% 超能充能。

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 武器击杀提供额外 1% 超能充能。

descriptions.en:
Grants a Stack of Warlord's Sigil on (Glaive) Melee Kills for 5 seconds, increasing (Glaive) Melee Damage.

(Glaive) Melee Damage Increase at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
55% | 110% | 165% | 220% | 275%

PVE Combatants hit by <:stasis:915198000727461909>Penumbral Blast automatically shatter.
descriptions.zh-chs:
近战击杀后获得“督军印记”：
“督军印记”持续 5 秒，提供额外近战伤害，可叠加 5 层。

额外近战伤害：
55% | 110% | 165% | 220% | 275%

descriptions.en:
Melee Kills grant <:solar:720178909361995786>Cure x3 and <:solar:720178909361995786>Restoration x1 for 8 seconds.

Finishers grant <:solar:720178909361995786>Cure x3 and <:solar:720178909361995786>Restoration x2 instead for the same 8 seconds.

Only works with the <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Element Grenades named <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Grenade equipped.

<:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Grenades have Fastball intrinsically and last 4 seconds longer (4🠚8s normally, 6🠚10s with <:solar:720178909361995786>Touch of Flame equipped).

Powered Melee Kills grant 5 seconds of Sunbracers Ready. Using your Grenade Ability while Sunbracers Ready is active grants the Sunbracers buff.

'Sunbracers' grants 20,000% Additional Base 'Solar Grenade' Regeneration Rate for 5 seconds. (Effectively recharges ~132% of a 'Solar Grenade' charge per second)

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Hard-hitting two-burst fire.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

On Weapon Kill, for 🡅6.5 seconds:
• 15 Stability
• 20 Recoil Direction
• -15% Accuracy Cone Size
• -15% Accuracy Cone Growth

Stacks 2 times. Cone scalars stack multiplicatively.

Duration is refreshed on kills. Stays active while stowed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Upon readying the weapon within 3 seconds of getting a Kill with a different weapon:
Grants 20% Increased Damage and 15 Handling for 🡅8 seconds.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.
High damage, high recoil. Optimized for long-distance shooting.

Grants 30|50|60 Strength with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.
