Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with with a <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack of Feeding Frenzy for 3.5 seconds, increasing the Reload Speed of the weapon. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 8 | 50 | 60 | 75 | 100 Reload Speed Stat
• 0.975x | 0.9x | 0.868x | 0.837x | 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
提高装填速度，持续 3.5 秒，最高叠加 5 层。

10 | 45 | 55 | 70 | 100 装填速度。
- | 0.9x | 0.875x | 0.85x | 0.8x 填装动画系数。

descriptions.en:
After sprinting for 3 seconds:
Increases Reload Speed for 3 seconds.

Duration can be refreshed by tapping sprint. Being <:arc:720178925317128243>Amplified increases the bonus.

🡅 Buff duration is increased. Even stronger effect while <:arc:720178925317128243>Amplified.
Grants 7.77% Increased Damage against [Boss and Vehicle Combatants](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants).
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对首领和载具的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming <:void:720178940240461864>Void Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

On Orb of Power Pickups:
Grants 5%|7.5%|10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants the following to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.
Tapping the trigger gives this weapon less recoil and improves accuracy.

<:solar:720178909361995786>Daybreak Projectiles apply 30 <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch on hit (40 with <:solar:720178909361995786>Ember of Ashes) and deal 90% Increased Damage.

(Daybreak Projectiles can often hit twice for double Damage and double Scorch)

<:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch deals <:pve:922884406073507930>200% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[50%] Increased Damage and each Damage Tick grants 5% Melee Ability Energy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
黎明射弹命中时会造成 60 层灼烧。
如果装备了骨灰余烬，会提升到 90 层。

灼烧会对敌人造成 <:pve:922884406073507930>200% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[50%] 额外伤害。

当灼烧造成伤害时，会获得 [?] 近战能量。

descriptions.en:
Spawns 2 Threadlings upon destroying a Tangle.

Threadlings apply Unravel for <:pve:922884406073507930>[?] <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5] seconds on hit. This is increased to <:pve:922884406073507930>[?] <:pvp:922884468275019856>[7.5] seconds with Thread of Continuity equipped.

1 second after stowing <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

On Melee Hits, for 5.5 seconds:
• Grants 50 Airborne Effectiveness
• Grants ? Mobility
• Grants ?% Increased Jump Height
+ Refills the magazine of your held weapon from reserves

Powered Melee Hits refill the magazines of all your equipped weapons.

7 second cooldown between activations.

1 second after stowing Strand Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with an <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc or Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon. Melee kills grant ammo for this weapon.

Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Instantly reloads your held weapon upon dodging.

Counts as a manual reload an will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Grants 130% Melee Ability Energy if used within 15 meters of an enemy.

Holding [Grenade] summons a Sentient Arc Soul for 20 seconds and makes you Amplified.

Sentient Arc Soul grants 5% Grenade Energy once per burst if it damages an enemy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
按住[手雷]键召唤一个有电弧之魂，持续 20 秒，并使你进入增幅状态。

电弧之魂每次连射如果对敌人造成，会提供 4.5% 的手雷能量。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
This weapon has a well-rounded adaptive grip, reliable and sturdy. Kills with this weapon reload Sturm and overflow a bonus damage round into it.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar or Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The upper 50% of the Magazine has up to 20 Stability and 30 Reload Speed.

The benefits decrease linearly as the Magazine approaches 50% capacity.
descriptions.zh-chs: 此武器的前半弹匣弹药获得 +20 稳定性，+30 填装速度。

descriptions.en:
On Weapon Hits against an Ammo Brick:
Picks up Ammo, Refills all Weapons from reserves, and triggers Ammo Pickup Effects.

Only activates if picking up ammo is possible. However, shooting a <:special:968793055631114330>Special Ammo Brick (with at least one <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapon equipped) will bypass this restriction.

Weapon Hits against Orbs of Power collect them.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Range.

While Aiming Down Sights:
10% Increased Effective Zoom and 5% Faster Projectile Speed.

The Effective Zoom increase pushes out Aim Assist Falloff by 10%. It also reduces Recoil by 10% and narrows the Accuracy and Aim Assist Cones by the same amount.
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准时：
+10% 有效焦距（作用于有效射程、瞄准辅助距离），+5% 弹头速度。

descriptions.en:
On Precision Kill:
Target explodes, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>123.89 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[95.3] damage that matches the element of the weapon over a 4.5 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).
descriptions.zh-chs:
造成精准击杀时：
目标将爆炸，在 3 米范围内造成 65 点与武器元素类型相同的伤害。

对战斗人员将乘以 1.3 倍的伤害系数，之后再计算战斗人员阶级相关的系数。

descriptions.en:
Taking Damage while Guarding with a Sword grants Class Ability Energy:
• 🡅1.56% for every point of Melee Damage Blocked
• 🡅1.5% for every point of "other" Damage Blocked
• 🡅0.63% for every point of Non-Blocked Damage (getting hit from behind)

🡅 Increases Class Ability Energy gains by an additive 0.055%, 0.5%, and 0.125% in that order.

Weapon Kills grants strong projectile tracking for ? seconds. Stacks 4 times.

Dealing damage extends the buff duration.

Upon Blocking a Melee Attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
Suppresses and weakens the enemy, making them receive 20% increased damage for 4 seconds.

🡅 Passively grants 10 Ammo Capacity.

Grants 35% Flinch Reduction after 1 second of Aiming Down Sights (ADS) without firing.

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed. The perk remains active while ADS.
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准 1 秒后不射击：
-35% 后仰抖动，直到取消瞄准。

按下瞄准键即开始计时。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following while Crouched:
• 50 Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
• 0.8x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier

Passively grants 30 Inventory Size Stat. (50% more than 1 Reserve Armor Mod)
descriptions.zh-chs:
蹲下时：
+50 装填速度， 0.8x 填装动画系数， 0.8x 拔枪/收枪动画系数

被动提升备弹容量。

descriptions.en: Hard-hitting four-burst fire.

Passively Grants the following to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Linearly increases Explosive Damage after 0.2 seconds of the grenade being in flight.

Reaches the maximum 25% Explosive Damage Increase after 1.1 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
距目标 10 米范围外时，每米增加 0.63% 爆炸伤害。

50 米时增加 25% 爆炸伤害。

对属性为 50 爆炸范围的威能榴弹发射器，总计增加 17% 的伤害。

descriptions.en:
On Weapon Kill for 🡅8 seconds:
• 30% Increased Damage
• 20% Longer Firing Delay/Charge Time/Draw Time
• 10 Range

Bows and Shotguns only receive a 20% Damage Increase.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 7 秒内:
+30% 伤害
-20% 射速/充能效率
+10 射程

弓箭和霰弹枪仅 +20% 伤害。

🠅 增益持续时间增加到 8 秒。

descriptions.en:
During Winter's Wrath Super:
Shockwave (Heavy Attack) deals 100% increased Shatter Damage.

Allies within range of the Shockwave (30 meters) receive the following for 15 seconds:
• 50 HP <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Overshield
• 4 Stacks of <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapon Surge

On Rift Cast with the <:stasis:915198000727461909>Frostpulse Aspect equipped:
You and Allies within ? meters receive 2 Stacks of <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapon Surge for <:pve:922884406073507930>10 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5] seconds alongside a 50 HP <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Overshield that lasts 15 seconds.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Upon scoring 50% of Magazine as Precision Hits:
20% increased damage for 11 seconds.

Duration can be refreshed by scoring enough precision hits.

Stowing or Reloading resets the Precision Hit counter but the buff remains active while stowed.

Activation Condition is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹匣的一半弹药造成精准伤害后：
+20% 伤害，持续 11 秒。

达到足够精确命中数后可刷新持续时间。

收枪或装填将重置精确命中计数。该特性触发后，收枪也会维持武器的增益效果。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills grant a stacking Damage Buff until stowing or reloading the weapon. Maximum of 3 stacks.

<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10% | 20% | 30% Increased Damage
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 5% | 10% | 15% Increased Damage

🡅 Passively grants 10 Magazine Stat. (Identical to Tactical Mag)

Passively grants 🡅12 Airborne Effectiveness.

Grants 🡅32 Airborne Effectiveness per stack for 5 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.

Grounded Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack while airborne kills grant 2 Stacks.

🡅 Grants 2 more Airborne Effectiveness passively and per Stack.
Projectiles will detonate when they are within close proximity of their targets.
Absorbing a Remnant strengthens Mark of the Devourer and partially refills the magazine.

Increases <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Upon finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
25% Increased Damage for 🡅5.5 seconds.

Buff stays active while stowed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Grants 1 Stack of Rapid Hit per Precision Hit, improving Reload Speed and Stability for 2 seconds. Further Precision Hits refresh the duration.

Benefits at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 2|12|14|18|25 Stability
• 5|30|35|42|60 Reload Speed
• 0.99x|0.96x|0.95x|0.945x|0.92x Reload Duration Multiplier

🡅 Stronger Effect.

Successive Hits while firing full-auto grant a scaling Damage Buff after scoring 12.5% of the Magazine Capacity as hits. Missing deactivates the buff.

Stacks displayed on-screen are only visual aides, the buff [ramps up with each shot](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock)  once active. Reaches maximum strength at 5 Stacks.

% of the Magazine Capacity as Hits required for each Visual Stack: 12.5%|35.5%|54.5%|74.5%|110.5%

Damage Buff ramps up from 🡅<:pve:922884406073507930>18.82% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[12.55%] to 🡅<:pve:922884406073507930>45% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[30%] upon reaching maximum strength.

Assuming no missed shots, it provides roughly a 🡅<:pve:922884406073507930>28.13% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[19.02%] [Damage Buff on average](https://url.d2clarity.com/PvETargetLock) after firing 100% of the Magazine.

Activation Condition is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.

🡅 Damage Buff is increased by <:pve:922884406073507930>12.5% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[20%].

Grants the following upon finishing a Reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
• 20 Aim Assist
• -20% Accuracy Cone Size
• ? ADS Handling for 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
消灭目标后在 6 秒内填装：
+20 瞄准辅助、-20% 瞄准圆锥范围、[?] 瞄准时的操控性，持续 5 秒。

该增益持续时间无法被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Sol Invictus buff from Sunspots lasts twice as long (5 >> 10 seconds).

Sunspots you create now affect allies, granting them the Sol Invictus buff for 10 seconds.

Sol Invictus on Allies:
• 100% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate
• 20-40% decreased Passive Super Drain
• Restoration x1

While Aiming Down Sights with <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

While at or above 50% Magazine Capacity:
Direct Hits apply 40 <:stasis:915198000727461909>Slow Stacks for <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.5] seconds to enemies within 4 meters.

Only activates once per shot/burst. Whisper of Durance increases slow duration by <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[0.5] seconds.

Activation Condition is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.
descriptions.zh-chs:
前半弹匣直接命中敌人时：
将产生一个冰影爆炸，附近 [?] 米内的敌人获得 50 层减速效果。持续 <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.5] 秒。

每次射击仅触发一次效果。
（狼群弹药可触发多次。）

耐久之吟 可将持续时间增加到 <:pve:922884406073507930>8 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2] 秒。

descriptions.en:
Performs a dive to the ground in the direction of your movement input. Not inputting a movement direction results in a vertical downward dive.

Applies <:solar:720178909361995786>Cure x2 to you and allies within 9 meters upon landing.

Grants additional benefits if <:solar:720178909361995786>Heat Rises is active:
Grants you <:solar:720178909361995786>Restoration x2 for 3 seconds instantly upon activation. Deals 100 Damage and applies 40 <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch Stacks (60 with <:solar:720178909361995786>Ember of Ashes) to enemies within 5 meters upon landing.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.

Reviving allies or being revived grants you and allies within 15 meters a 100 HP Overshield for 10 seconds.

Leaving the 15 meter radius or breaking the Overshield of the wearer removes the Overshields.

Kills with a Weapon matching your Subclass Element grant <:solar:720178909361995786>Restoration x1 to you and allies within 15 meters for 3 seconds. 3 second cooldown between activations.

Super Kills spawn an Orb of Power for Allies.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.75%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

1.5? second cooldown between Orb spawns.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

While Last Guardian Standing or Solo:
20 Range, 20 Stability, 50 Reload Speed, and 10 Aim Assist.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你成为火力战队最后存活的成员或单刷时：

可提高 20 填装速度、 20 稳定性、 10 瞄准辅助和 10 射程。

descriptions.en:
On Grenade Ability Usage:
Changes Weapon Element to match your Subclass until stowed.

Kinetic weapons lose their Passive Damage Bonus (10-15%) against PVE Combatants.

Passively Grants the following to Strand Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

After being in Combat for 12 seconds:
Grants 15% Increased Damage, 100 Handling, and 100 Reload Speed for 7 seconds.

Works and can activate while stowed. Dealing and receiving damage refreshes the buff duration.

For Frenzy, being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 🡅5 seconds.

🡅 Allowed time between damage exchanges USED TO BE extended by 0.5 seconds. Currently provides no benefit.

Passively Grants the following to Strand Weapons:
• 5|8|10 Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.9x|0.85x|0.8x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.85x|0.75x|0.7x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upon Blocking an attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
Grats 50% Increased Damage for 2 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
做出防御动作的 0.5 秒内成功格挡敌人伤害：
+50% 伤害，持续 2 秒。

descriptions.en: Finishing a reload within 5.3? seconds of a Kill grants <:solar:720178909361995786>Cure x1 for you and allies within ? meters.

Upon missing multiple times within 2.5 seconds of each without scoring a hit:
Grants +25? Stability for 2.5? seconds.

Misses in a row required:
• Auto Rifle: 10
• Hand Cannon: 4
• Linear Fusion Rifle, Pulse Rifle: unknown

Buff is removed 1? second after scoring a hit.

descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对强大的战斗人员、首领和载具的伤害。

descriptions.en: One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher. Projectiles release a wave of energy when they contact the ground.

Passively grants -200 Blast Radius.

Rank-and-File and Elite Combatants within ? meters of the explosion are disoriented for ? seconds. (Effectively the equivalent of <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Blind without any of the elemental synergies)

Players near the explosion have their HUD removed, and screen whitened for up to ? seconds. Duration varies depending on the distance from the blast.
descriptions.zh-chs: 榴弹爆炸可产生短暂失明效果。

descriptions.en:
Splits off 50% of the Weapon's Bodyshot Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that deals 30% Increased Damage in PvE and isn't affected by Damage Falloff.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PvE] Total damage is increased by 15% of the weapon's Bodyshot Damage. For crits, the overall increase is roughly equal to 15% divided by the Crit Multiplier.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PvP] Total damage remains roughly the same.
descriptions.zh-chs:
将 50% 原伤害量，转换为爆炸伤害，该爆炸伤害提升 30% 伤害量。
引爆延迟和距离相关。

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 实际增加 15% 命中身体的伤害。 精准伤害的提升量根据武器类型变化。

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 总伤害量不变（即只有射程上的收益）。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier
Breaking a Combatant Shield with the matching Elemental Damage Type grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.
Finishing a reload within 5.2 seconds of a Precision Kill reduces Firing Delay by 30% for 6 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在精准击杀后 6 秒内装填：
提高射速（降低 30% 射击间隔），持续 6 秒。
该增益可以被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

On Weapon Kill, for 🡅8 seconds:
• 30 Stability
• 1.45x Damage Falloff Start and End Distance
• 3-3.5° Precision Aim Angle
• -95%? Accuracy Cone Size
• -95%? Accuracy Cone Growth.

Only applies to hipfiring.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Each shot while holding down the trigger grants:
• 🡅1.25 Stability
• 🡅-6.25% Accuracy Cone Size
• 🡅-12.5% Accuracy Cone Growth

Reaches maximum strength after 🡅8 shots, granting 10 Stability, -50% Accuracy Cone Size, and -100% Accuracy Cone Growth.

🡅 Effect reaches maximum strength 2 shots sooner.
Finishers consume 3 Stacks of Armor Charge and spawn an Orb of Power for allies.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Grants 30|50|60 Resilience with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Upon dealing damage with all your weapons within 7 seconds of each:
35% increased damage for 10 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在 [?] 秒内使用所有武器造成伤害后：
提高 35% 该武器伤害，持续 10 秒。

descriptions.en:
While Aiming Down Sights with Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Energy Weapons are refunded 1 Ammo upon hitting Matching Elemental Shields.

Refills magazine upon breaking a PVP Combatant, Barrier Champion, or Guardian Shield.
descriptions.zh-chs:
打破战斗人员、勇士、或守护者的护盾时：重新装填弹匣。

若能量武器与战斗护盾元素类型吻合，击中目标时可重生弹药。

descriptions.en: Radar stays active while aiming down sights.

Upon blocking damage with the Glaive Shield:
20% increased Projectile Damage for 🡅5 seconds or until no longer blocking.

Blocking any hit refreshes the duration.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Starts Health Regeneration and restores 80 HP upon reaching 100% Activation Progress with Weapon Kills.

Activation Progress by Enemy Rank:
• Minor Combatants: 33.3%
• Players: 66.6%
• Majors and Bosses: 100%

Weapon Kills must be within 5 seconds of each.
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器连续击杀 3 名敌人时：
开始生命恢复，恢复总值约为 80 点。

普通敌人记为 1 个击杀。
守护者记为 2 个击杀。
精英、强大敌人、首领记为 3 个击杀。

连续击杀敌人需在 5 秒内完成。

descriptions.en:
Increases Strand Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.
Rapid precision hits create a lightning storm at the point of impact.

While hipfiring:
• 25 Stability
• 15 Aim Assist
• 2.7° Larger Precision Aim Angle
• -30% Accuracy Cone Size
• 20% Increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
• 20% Increased Damage Falloff Distance

The Damage Falloff Increase does not apply to The Last Word, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Fusion Rifles.

🡅 Stronger Effect.
Landing multiple rockets loads a grenade. [Alternate Weapon Action]  to switch into Grenade Launcher mode.

Loads 🡅3 Ammo at a time.
Reduces Reload Speed by 35.

🡅 Loads 1 more Ammo at a time.
All equipped weapons get refilled from reserves on melee kills.

While blocking and stationary:
Glaive Projectiles Hits grant 90% Increased Weapon Energy.
Refills 1 round into the Magazine from reserves upon blocking damage. 1 second cooldown after activation.

Super Kills spawn an Orb of Power for Allies.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.75%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

1.5? second cooldown between Orb spawns.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

When a Class Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Class Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Class Ability Energy refunds.

Class Ability Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

Sliding refills 15% of the Magazine and grants 20 Range and 30 Stability for 3 seconds OR until firing.

Only active for the first shot (of the burst).

0.3 second cooldown after activation but can be reactivated multiple times during a slide by firing off shots loaded by the perk.
descriptions.zh-chs:
滑行时：
重新装填 15% 弹匣，+20 射程，+30 稳定性，持续 3 秒或直到开枪。
仅第一发子弹有效。

0.3 秒冷却时间，但一次滑行中快速射击可触发多次该特性效果。

descriptions.en:
Only works in PvE game modes.

Ammo Brick Pickups grants an additional 1% of your Total Reserves to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons matching the Ammo Type. This is increased to 10% with Trace Rifles and Swords.

Always rounds up to the nearest whole number. Functions the same way regardless of what spawned the Ammo Brick.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Total Reserves.
Increases the Maximum Number of Armor Charge Stacks you can hold from 3 to 4|5|6 with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

On Orb of Power Pickups:
Grants 5%|7.5%|10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Equipping multiple Root of Nightmares Weapons grants increased Handling, Reload Speed, as well as Increased Damage against Tormentors, Lucent Hive, and Enemy Players in their Super.

Nezarec counts as a Tormentor. Ghosts of the Deep bosses count as Lucent Hive.

Bonuses with 2|3 Root of Nightmares weapons:
• <:pve:922884406073507930>3.33% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>9.98% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?%] Increased Damage
• 10 | 20 Handling
• 0 | 20 Reload Speed
• 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
Super Kills cause enemies within ? meters of the target to be Suspended.

Scoring multiple Precision Hits within 2 seconds of each applies Sever to enemies within ? meters of the target.

? second cooldown between activations.

Activation Progress per Precision Hit:
• Slug Shotguns: 50%
• Bows, Sniper Rifles: 34%
• Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 25%
• Sidearms: 20%
• Auto Rifles: 15%
• Machine Guns, Pulse Rifles: 12%
• Submachine Guns, Trace Rifles: 10%

Strand Debuffs generally last 50% longer.

Specific increases from Thread of Continuity for debuff sources can be found in their descriptions.

Dealing damage grants Grenade Ability Energy for each damage instance.

Grenade Ability Energy Gains vary depending on the source. (Almost impossible to reliably test but the effects are quite significant if you're actively participating in combat)

Orb of Power pickups grant 1 Stack of Explosive Light, granting 100 Blast Radius and Increased Damage.

Consumes 1 Stack per Shot. Maximum of 6 Stacks.

Rocket Launchers: 25% Increased Impact and Explosive Damage. (No effect on Wolfpack Rounds)

Grenade Launchers: Increases Explosive Damage damage by 60%.
descriptions.zh-chs:
每拾取 1 个能量球获取 1 层爆炸光能，提升伤害并 +100 爆炸范围。

最高叠加 6 层。每次射击消耗 1 层。

榴弹发射器：提升 65% 至 84% 爆炸伤害。总伤害量提升约为 52%。

火箭发射器：提升 25% 冲击伤害和爆炸伤害。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

If no enemies are within 15 meters:
Grants 🡅12 Range, 🡅32 Reload Speed, and decreases Accuracy Cone Growth by 🡅7.5?%.

🡅 Grants an additional 2? Range and Reload Speed, and decreases Accuracy Cone Growth further by an additive 2.5?%.

On hit against Minor Combatants:
Grants 1 Stack of Redirection, up to a maximum of 20 Stacks.

On hit against [Major, Boss, or Vehicle](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) Combatants, for one shot:
Consumes up to 5 Stacks granting 20% Increased Damage per Stack consumed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
命中普通敌人时：
获得 1 层转向增益，最高叠加 10 层。

命中精英、次级首领、首领敌人时：
每层增益 +20% 伤害，最高 100%。

当增益层数不高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 1 层增益。
当增益层数高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 5 层增益。

descriptions.en:
Upon getting a Kill from any source matching the alignment (Light/Darkness) of the weapon:
Grants 20% Increased Damage for 6 seconds.

Can activate and stay active while stowed.

Light Alignment: <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc, <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar, <:void:720178940240461864>Void
Darkness Alignment: <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis, Strand

Grants the following to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Enables hipfiring while in Lift and passively grants 50 Airborne Effectiveness while hipfiring.

Increases Lift Duration to 4 seconds:
• High Lift: 2.6🠚4 (54% Increase)
• Strafe Lift: 2.2🠚4 (82% Increase)
• Catapult Lift: 1🠚4 (300% Increase)

Passively grants 40 Airborne Effectiveness, 100 Handling, and a 0.6x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier to Submachine Guns.

While holding an SMG:
• Grants 50 Mobility
• Reduces ADS Movement Penalty to 9% (from 25%)
• Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
• Increases Slide Distance by 33%

Refills the magazine of Submachine Guns 1 second after stowing them.

Passively Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25% and Slide Distance by 33%. Sprinting for 1.5 seconds grants Linear Actuators for 7 seconds.

On Melee Hit with Linear Actuators active:
Applies Shocked debuff to the hit enemy. Shocked enemies chain <:pve:922884406073507930>220 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[50] <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Damage to targets within 12 meters and spread the Shocked debuff.

Shocked lasts 2 seconds and its duration is refreshed on chains. Shocked Players are immune to further chains for 2 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺 1.5 秒后，获得"线性促动器"，持续 7 秒。

在近战命中时:
"线性促动器"对敌人施加震荡 2 秒，释放一个连锁电弧，当另一个敌人在 20 米范围内时就会连锁。震荡会在连锁时被刷新。

[PVE] [?] 伤害
[PVP] 85 伤害。在震荡状态下对额外的连锁伤害免疫，持续 2 秒。

+6.25% 冲刺速度
+33% 滑行距离

descriptions.en: This weapon does more damage to enemies based on the number of SIVA nanites that attach to them.

Grants Class Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown after activation.

Class Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>12% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>17% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[8.5%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%]

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation.

Creates a tall but less curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

The barricade bulges outward and thus provides a level of vertical protection as well when standing very close to it.

Standing right next to the barricade also consistently prevents emeny melee attacks from hitting you through it.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation and keeps you crouched after.

Creates a shorter but more curved see-through barricade that blocks all projectiles fired at it. Lasts 20 seconds and has 500 HP.

While behind it, Aiming Down Sights in the direction of the barricade causes you to temporarily stand up and allows you to peek over it.

Grants the following benefits to you and allies while standing behind it:
• 10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance
• 50% Flinch Resistance
• 30 Stability
• 100 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier

Upon scoring 4 Precision Hits within 3 seconds of each:
Grants ? Reload Speed and ? Handling for 10 seconds.

Activating the buff on an Elite or Miniboss or stunning a Champion marks them for 30 seconds. Mark duration cannot be refreshed.

Marked enemies are highlighted for allies take 20% Increased Damage from them. Damage Increase stacks with everything.

Upon marking a target for the first time, Aeon Allies not using Sect of Force receive 33.33% Grenade and Melee Ability Energy per second for 3 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在 2.5 秒内完成 4 次精准攻击会获得“永劫教派武器加速”增益，持续6秒。

“永劫教派武器加速”提供 +10 填装速度（附带 0.8x 填装动画系数），对拔枪/收枪动作 +10 操控性。

在击晕勇士、次级首领或者首领时：
• 30 米范围内的队友获得 50% 的手雷和近战能量。
• 永劫教派队友额外获得 10% 的超量能量。

触发间隔 4 秒。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

On Matching Elemental Shield Break:
Explosion disorients enemies within 7 meters for 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
打破属性相匹配的元素护盾时：
爆炸可使 7 米范围内敌人迷失方向，持续 5 秒。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing Kinetic Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.
Finishers make you <:arc:720178925317128243>Amplified.
Precision Kills against <:arc:720178925317128243>Blinded enemies create an explosion, <:arc:720178925317128243>Blinding enemies within 3? meters.

Killing 2 enemies within ? seconds of each while <:arc:720178925317128243>Amplified creates an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.

Upon being struck by a Melee Attack, for 5 seconds:
Grants <:pve:922884406073507930>75% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[50%] Increased Melee Damage for one Melee Attack.

Buff duration is not refreshable.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with with a Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Passive benefits:
• 30 Airborne Effectiveness
• 25% Increased Blink distance
• ?% Decreased Blink Cooldown
• <:void:720178940240461864>Nova Warp's Dark Blink does not consume Super Energy

Blinking grants 100 Ready Handling and the Radar remains active during the animation. Enemies within 10 meters become <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile when initiating Blink (animation does not need to start).
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提升 +30 空中效率。

+25% 闪烁距离。
并减少 [?]% 闪烁冷却时间。

当闪烁时：
+100 操控性（对拔枪动作），并且使雷达保持活跃状态。

descriptions.en:
•  Arrows fired while aiming down sights cause Sacred Flames to instantly detonate.

•  Precision hits with perfectly drawn arrows increase the power of this detonation.

Upon getting a Kill from any source matching the alignment (Light/Darkness) of the weapon:
Grants 20% Increased Damage for 🡅7 seconds.

Can activate and stay active while stowed.

Light Alignment: <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc, <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar, <:void:720178940240461864>Void
Darkness Alignment: <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis, Strand

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.
Refills stowed weapon from reserves after 2.5 seconds of stowing it.
descriptions.es:
Rellena el arma, si esta guardada, luego de 2.5 segundos

Mejorado: El tiempo de activacion se reduce a 2.3 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs: 武器收起 2.5 秒后重新装填弹匣。

descriptions.en:
Increases Grenade Impact Damage by 50%.

Due to the ratio of Explosive and Impact Damage being tied to the Blast Radius (BR) stat on Grenade Launchers (GLs), a lower stat will provide a higher overall damage increase.

Total Damage Increases:
• Lightweight <:special:968793055631114330>Special GLs at 95-100 BR: 10.8-10.1%
• Double Fire <:special:968793055631114330>Special GLs at 55-85 BR: 17.9-13.2%
• Adaptive <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy GLs at 45-100 BR: 11.2-6.3%
• Rapid-Fire <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy GLs at 15-100 BR: 13.9%-6.3%

Note that these values won't necessarily be accurate if other damage perks that only affect Impact or Explosive Damage (like Explosive Light) are active.
descriptions.zh-chs:
+50% 榴弹直击伤害。

因爆炸伤害和直击伤害的比例和榴弹发射器“爆炸范围”属性相关，故尖刺榴弹起作用时，更低的爆炸范围可造成更高的总伤害。

单发榴弹发射器：
• 0 爆炸范围：+25% 总伤害 | • 100 爆炸范围：+12.5% 总伤害

重型榴弹发射器：
• 0 爆炸范围：+15% 总伤害 | • 100 爆炸范围：+6.25% 总伤害

descriptions.en:
Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Strand Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

Elemental Pickup Interactions grant <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Increased Damage for 7 seconds.

Additional Pickup Interactions extend the duration by 7 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

Elemental Pickup Interactions:
• Throwing Strand Tangles or Elemental Orbs
• Collecting <:solar:720178909361995786>Firesprites, <:arc:720178925317128243>Ionic Traces, <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Shards, or <:void:720178940240461864>Void Breaches
Grants 4%|5%|6% Class Ability Energy on Orb of Power Pickups with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
Hard-hitting two-burst fire.
Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.
The further a Void orb falls, the more powerful its detonation becomes.

Elemental Kill grant 1 Stack of Recombination.
Maximum of 🡅8 stacks.

Each Stack increases the damage of the next shot by <:pve:922884406073507930>🡅12.5% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[🡅6.25%].

🡅 Damage Buff ramps up 25% faster, reaching maximum strength 2 Stacks sooner.
Grants 30 Magazine Stat. Identical to Extended Mag.

Missing has a chance to refund ammo:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 35%
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 20%

Rifts and <:solar:720178909361995786>Well of Radiances you cast grant 100 Reload Speed and a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier to all weapons for Players inside.

**Empowering** Rifts and <:solar:720178909361995786>Well of Radiances you cast also double the Damage Falloff Distance of weapons.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当站在裂隙或光焰之井内时：
为所有在内的守护者提供 +100 装填速度，0.9 倍装填动画系数。

当在**强能裂隙**或光焰之井内时：
增加 100% 的伤害衰减距离。

descriptions.en:
Refills held weapon from reserves after sprinting for 1.5 seconds.

Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25% and Slide Distance by 33%.

Prevents Crouch Speed from being decreased below 4 meters per second.

Refills stowed weapons from reserves upon finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a Weapon Kill.

Passively grants 20 Reload Speed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 6 秒内完成填装：
重新填装 收起的武器。

被动提升 +20 填装速度。

descriptions.en: Dealing continuous damage extends the duration of Ravenous Beast.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Restores Health on reload based on the amount of hits before reload.
Health gain per hit varies between Weapon Types.

Ranges between 20 HP to 80 HP for a full magazine.
descriptions.zh-chs:
根据填装之前完成的命中数恢复生命值。
每次命中可恢复的生命值和武器类型相关。

可恢复生命值为 20 至 80 点。

descriptions.en: Full Auto. Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

Splits off 50% of the Bow's Bodyshot Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that deals 30% Increased Damage in PvE.

Detonation time after hitting a target or surface varies on draw and distance.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PvE] Total damage is increased by ~15% of the weapon's Bodyshot Damage. On crits, the overall increase is 10.33% for Precision Bows and 9.69% for Lightweight Bows.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PvP] Total damage remains roughly the same.
descriptions.zh-chs:
将 50% 原伤害量，转换为爆炸伤害，该爆炸伤害提升 30% 伤害量。
引爆延迟和距离相关。

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 实际增加 15% 命中身体的伤害。 精准伤害的提升量根据武器类型变化。

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 总伤害量不变（即只有射程上的收益）。

descriptions.en: Scoring 3 Precision Hits within 2 seconds of each refunds 1 Ammo to the Magazine.
descriptions.zh-chs:
3 次精准命中后，向弹夹内装填 1 枚弹药。
两次精准命中时间间隔不得超过 2 秒。

descriptions.en:
Upon readying a Sword:
30% Increased damage for 🡅2 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 0.5? seconds.

Reduces Incoming <:void:720178940240461864>Void Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Deals increased damage against [Minibosses, Bosses, and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants), as well as Players in their Super Ability.

Damage Increase by Ammo Type:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[40-50%]
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: <:pve:922884406073507930>15% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10-20%]
• <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Weapons: <:pve:922884406073507930>10% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5-10%]

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability and Guard Resistance (Swords).

Upon emptying the Magazine:
Refills 60% of the number of Hits landed into the Magazine from reserves. Always rounds up.

Requires firing 28.75% of the Magazine Capacity for the refill to activate. Always rounds up.

Hits after triggering a refill do not count while the Rewind Rounds buff is active (1? second).
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹匣为空时：
根据命中次数重新装填弹匣。

回弹比例：
主武器 50-60% | 特殊武器 30-40%

descriptions.en: This weapon fires a small auto-tracking missile. Missiles lock onto targets when aimed.

The next 5 Hits within 🡅9 seconds of using your Class Ability seconds apply Sever.

Applying Sever refreshes the buff duration. Activates even while stowed.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1? second.

Provides a stacking Damage Buff on Weapon Kills:
10% | 21% | 33.1% Increased Damage at 1|2|3 Stacks for 4.5 seconds.

Weapon Kills refresh the buff's duration. Buff persists while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀时:
提高 10% | 21% | 33.1% 伤害，持续 4.5 秒。
击杀可刷新 Buff 时间。

descriptions.en:
Hits against Non-Matching or Barrier Champion Shields deal increasingly higher damage.
Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.

Damage Increase per Weapon Archetype:
• Fusion Rifles: 🡅34.8% per hit, up to 🡅522%
• Machine Guns, Auto/Pulse/Trace Rifles: 🡅40% per hit, up to 🡅600%
• Linear Fusion Rifles: 🡅180% per hit, up to 🡅540%
• Bows, Glaives, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 🡅200% per hit, up to 🡅600%

🡅 The damage buff is increased by 20%. (e.g. 150% » 180%)

Grants Stat Bonuses depending on the number of Charged Abilities.

Stat Bonuses with 1|2|3+ Charged Abilities:
• 5|15|25 Stability
• 5|25|60 Handling
• 10|25|60 Reload Speed
descriptions.zh-chs:
根据完全充能的技能数量提升属性状态。

三个完全充能的技能达到最大效果。

•  +5 | +15 | +25 稳定性
•  +5 | +25 | +50 填装速度
•  +10 | +25 | +50 操控性

descriptions.en:
While Aiming Down Sights with <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

On <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Ammo Pickup:
Grants 🡅35% of your maximum <:special:968793055631114330>Special Ammo Reserves.

Equipping two <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons halves the amount of ammo granted.

🡅 Increases the amount of Special Ammo received by an additive 10%.

Finishers and Powered Melee Kills trigger a Kinetic Explosion centered on the enemy. 1 second cooldown between activations.

Explosion Damage based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 250 Damage, 10? meter Radius
• Elites: 665 Damage, ?m Radius
• Minibosses and higher: 797 Damage, 15?m Radius

Unknown for Players currently. Listed damage numbers are at the center of the explosion as the damage falls off toward the edge of the radius.

Finishers upgrade the explosion to the one triggered by a Powered Melee on a one rank higher target.

Explosions triggered by Powered Melee Kills (bugged with Finishers) can chain on kills and will trigger weaker explosions that deal up to 268 damage in a 8? meter radius.
Well-rounded, reliable, fires a 3-round burst.

Reduces Incoming <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Grants 30|50|60 Intellect with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Increases <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.
High damage, high recoil.

Killing <:stasis:915198000727461909>Frozen or <:stasis:915198000727461909>Slowed enemies grants Class Ability Energy based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 9%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 13%
• Enemy Players: 15%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 20%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites: 30%
• T4 Elites, Minibosses: 40%
• Bosses: 50%

<:stasis:915198000727461909>Slow you apply to targets and certain lingering abilities last longer.

Specific increases provided by <:stasis:915198000727461909>Whisper of Durance can be found in the descriptions of the affected abilities and/or perks.

<:stasis:915198000727461909>Freezing targets grants the following benefits for 11 seconds under the Stat Boost buff:
• 60 Mobility, Resilience, and Recovery
• 30? Stability
• 15 Aim Assist
• 20 Airborne Effectiveness

<:stasis:915198000727461909>Shattering enemies or <:stasis:915198000727461909>Crystals creates an additional damage instance, dealing up to <:pve:922884406073507930>25 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[9] damage in a <:pve:922884406073507930>10 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[8] meter radius. Falls off to <:pve:922884406073507930>17 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[4] Damage at the edge of the radius.

This translates to a maximum of a <:pve:922884406073507930>12.5% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[4.5%] total <:stasis:915198000727461909>Shatter Damage Increase.

Killing <:stasis:915198000727461909>Frozen enemies spawns an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.

Shattering a <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystal grants <:pve:922884406073507930>500% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[150%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 6 seconds, up to a maximum of 11 seconds.
Kills with this weapon return a fraction of the ammo used to the magazine from reserves, extending the beam's duration.

Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

While at Critical Health:
Being damaged releases a burst of <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Energy, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>50 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] damage and applying <:arc:720178925317128243>Jolt to enemies within ? meters.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 15? second cooldown between activations.

After 1.25 seconds of sprinting, and while maintaining both sprint and a movement speed of at least 5 meters per second:
Grants 20 Mobility, Resilience, and Recovery.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Grants a <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] [Empowering Buff](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs) to you and allies inside the Rift.

Grants 20% Damage Resistance during the Cast Animation. Rift lasts 15 seconds.

Heals you and allies in the Rift for 40 HP per second.

If at full health, the Rift grants 3 HP of Overshield per second, up to a 15 HP Overshield.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot deploy a healing turret on impact.
This weapon's beam superheats its targets upon impact, causing delayed explosions.

Grants Passive Stat Bonuses depending on your selected Subclass.

<:solar:720178909361995786>Solar: 50 Reload Speed
<:arc:720178925317128243>Arc: 50 Handling
<:void:720178940240461864>Void: 20 Stability
Strand: 20 Airborne Effectiveness
<:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis: 20 Recoil Direction & 5% reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty
descriptions.zh-chs:
根据当前的分支职业增加属性：

火： +50 填装速度
电： +50 操控性
虚空： +20 稳定性
冰影： +20 后座方向，降低 5% 瞄准时移动速度惩罚

descriptions.en:
Missing has a chance to refund ammo:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 35%
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 20%
This weapon has a well-rounded adaptive grip, reliable and sturdy. Kills with this weapon reload Sturm and overflow a bonus damage round into it.

Weapon Kills grant 10% Grenade Ability Energy.

Kills with Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Glaives, and Fusion Rifles grant 20%.

Using your Grenade Ability refills the Magazine with a 3 second cooldown.
descriptions.zh-chs:
<:primary:968793055677251604> 主武器和 <:heavy:968793055652106320> 重武器击杀可获取 10% 手雷技能能量。
大多数 <:special:968793055631114330> 特殊武器获取 20% 能量。

追踪步枪和榴弹发射器相较其他特殊武器，仅获得一半能量。

使用手雷技能将 重新装填 弹匣。
重新装填效果有 3 秒冷却时间。

descriptions.en:
Precision Hits decrease Draw Time by 25% for 🡅4 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.

Upon blocking damage with Glaive Shield:
Decreases Glaive Block's Movement Speed Penalty to 20?% for [?] seconds, or until you stop blocking.

(By default, the Movement Speed Penalty of Glaive Block is 45% with weapon energy and 25% without)
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用偃月阻挡伤害时：
提高敏捷[?]持续 [?] 秒，或直到你停止阻挡。

descriptions.en:
Refills stowed weapon from reserves after 🡅2.3 seconds of stowing it.

🡅 Activation time is reduced by 0.2 seconds.

Reduces Incoming <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.
Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.

While in Arc Staff Super:
• Blocking doesn't consume Super Energy
• Reflected projectiles deal 400% Increased Damage
• Reflecting ? damage generates an Orb of Power for allies that grants 7.14% Super Energy
descriptions.zh-chs:
在电弧法杖超能状态下：
• 格挡不消耗超能能量。
• 反弹的弹道造成 650% 的额外伤害。
• 反弹弹道可为队友产生能量球。

descriptions.en: At 10 stacks of Rewind Again, a small portal will open, shooting bullets from an alternate timeline version of this weapon. Precision hits extend the portal's duration.

Randomly grants 10% to 50% Increased Magazine Capacity upon reloading. Always rounds up.

🡅 Improves the average overflow amount.
Weapon Fires Full Auto. Identical to the Gameplay Setting.

1 second after stowing Kinetic Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

1 second after stowing Strand Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

On Weapon Kill:
Grants 8% Ability Energy split equally amongst all uncharged abilities.

Abilities with multiple charges only receive one third of the ability energy normally split to them once they have a full ability charge ready.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用武器击杀时：
获取 8% 的技能能量，平均分配到所有未充能的技能中。

如果你有 3 个以上技能充能完毕， 该 perk 将不会生效。

descriptions.en:
While Aiming Down Sights with Strand Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Grants Melee Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Melee Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>12% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>17% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[8.5%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%]
Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

If no enemies are within 15 meters:
Grants 10 Range, 30 Reload Speed, and decreases Accuracy Cone Growth by 5?%.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Upon landing after using Acrobat's Dodge:
• Allies within ? meters become <:solar:720178909361995786>Radiant
• Deals up to <:pve:922884406073507930>40 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[20] damage to targets over a ? meter radius

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Instantly reloads your held weapon upon dodging.

Counts as a manual reload an will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Grants 130% Melee Ability Energy if used within 15 meters of an enemy.

Upon picking up <:special:968793055631114330>Special or <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Ammo:
Magazine gets refilled and overflowed from reserves.

Maxes out at 100% Increased Magazine Capacity. Activates even if stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
拾取 <:special:968793055631114330> 特殊或 <:heavy:968793055652106320> 重型弹药：
武器使用备弹过量装填至 200% 弹匣量。

武器收起时也可触发。

descriptions.en:
Powered Sword Hits apply <:stasis:915198000727461909>Slow Stacks for <:pve:922884406073507930>4.25 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.5] seconds.

Light Attacks apply 40 Slow Stacks, Heavy Attacks apply 60.

Scoring 2 Precision Multikills generates an Orb of Power at the target's location for allies that grants 3.57% Super Energy.

Finishers spawn Ammo Bricks for allies based on [enemy rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Elites: <:special:968793055631114330>Special Ammo Brick
• Miniboss or Boss: <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Ammo Brick

Spawned Ammo Bricks grant 60% of a Regular Ammo Brick's pickup amount but retain full variability.

Finishing an Elite, Miniboss, or Boss grants ?% Super Energy to Aeon Allies not using Sect of Insight.
descriptions.zh-chs:
2 次精准多杀会为队友掉落一个能量球。

终结一个精英敌人会为队友生成一盒特殊弹药。
终结一个次级首领会为队友生成一盒重弹药。

永劫教派同伴额外获得 35% 的伤害增加，持续 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants Class Ability Energy upon dealing Powered Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Class Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>12% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>17% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[8.5%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%]

Weapon Kills at Critical Health heal you to 70 HP.

While your Shields are active (above 70 HP):
Taking damage grants 5% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy. 1 second cooldown between activations.

Upon scoring a Powered <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Melee Kill:
Refunds used Melee Ability Charge and starts Health Regeneration.
descriptions.zh-chs: <:arc:720178925317128243>电弧近战技能击杀可恢复生命值并回复全部近战能量。

descriptions.en:
Weighted Throwing Knife gains a second bounce with greatly increased tracking.

Scoring 3 Precision Hits within 2.5 seconds of each grants Strengthened Throwing Knife for 10 seconds.
Additional Precision Hits increase buff duration by 5 seconds each, up to 30 seconds.

Strengthened Throwing Knife:
• Grants 50 Strength while the buff is active
• Deals <:pve:922884406073507930>200% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] Increased Damage
• Stuns Unstoppable Champions
• Buff is consumed on Knife Hit
descriptions.zh-chs:
权衡飞刀可以弹跳两次，跟踪能力大大增强。

在 2.5 秒内完成 3 次精确命中：获得强化权衡飞刀。
每完成一次精确命中，持续时间增加 5 秒，最多可增加到 30 秒。

强化权衡飞刀造成 <:pve:922884406073507930>200% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] 额外伤害，并可击晕势不可挡勇士。

命中敌人将消耗强化权衡飞刀。

descriptions.en:
Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Grants an extra Melee Charge to Solar Subclasses.

All Melee Charges are recharged simultaneously.
(Eg: Both are recharged on Gambler's Dodge)

Throwing Knife Kills increase Throwing Knife Damage by 30%|60%|100% after 1|2|3 Kills for 5 seconds. Class Ability usage refreshes the buff's duration.

Interaction with the <:solar:720178909361995786>Knock 'Em Down Aspect while <:solar:720178909361995786>Radiant:
• Knife Kills restore 1 Charge.
• Knife Trick Precision Kills and Direct <:solar:720178909361995786>Ignition kills in which Knife Trick applies <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch restores both Charges.

On Weapon Kill for 7 seconds:
• 30% Increased Damage
• 20% Longer Firing Delay/Charge Time/Draw Time
• 10 Range

Bows and Shotguns only receive a 20% Damage Increase.
descriptions.es:
Luego de una baja:
Aumento de daño en un 30%, aumento 10 al alcance y disminucion de 20% a la Cadencia de Tiro o Velocidad de Carga durante 7 segundos

Arcos y Escopetas solo reciben un 20% de aumento a su daño

La Cadencia de Tiro tiende a cambiar hacia el proximo armazon mas lento. Por Ejemplo: Fusil automatico de Precision => Fusil automatico de Alto Impacto

Mejorado: La duracion del bufo aumenta a un maximo de 8 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 7 秒内:
+30% 伤害
-20% 射速/充能效率
+10 射程

弓箭和霰弹枪仅 +20% 伤害。

descriptions.en:
While blocking and stationary:
Glaive Projectiles Hits grant 🡅100% Increased Weapon Energy.

🡅 Energy Bonus on Hit is increased by an additive 10%.

1 second after stowing <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Grants the following on Weapon Kills for 🡅5.5 seconds:
• 15% Increased Damage
• Maximized Movement Speed

Remains active even if stowed.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Ally Deaths grant 25% Class Ability Energy and 40% Damage Resistance for 15 seconds in PVE.

Reviving Allies grants 100% Class Ability Energy and 40% Damage Resistance for 10 seconds in PVE.

Allies at Critical Health within 10 meters receive 25% Damage Resistance in PVE. Aeon Allies who are not using Sect of Vigor additionally receive 15% Class Ability Energy per second. Buff lingers for 1 second once no longer at Critical Health.
descriptions.zh-chs:
队友死亡时你可获得 25% 的职业技能能量。
复活队友时获得完整的职业技能能量。

施放超能能在 30 米范围内完全治愈队友。

永劫教派队友获得 110 点覆盖护盾，持续 20 秒，3 秒后自动回复。

descriptions.en:
Grants Class Ability Energy upon dealing Powered Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Class Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>12% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>17% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[8.5%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%]

On Weapon Hits against an Ammo Brick:
Picks up Ammo, Refills all Weapons from reserves, and triggers Ammo Pickup Effects.

Only activates if picking up ammo is possible. However, shooting a <:special:968793055631114330>Special Ammo Brick (with at least one <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapon equipped) will bypass this restriction.

Weapon Hits against Orbs of Power collect them.
descriptions.zh-chs:
命中弹药盒时：
拾取弹药盒并从备弹中 重新装填 所有武器。

可触发弹药拾取相关特性。仅在可以拾取弹药时触发。

descriptions.en: Grants 60 Guard Resistance, Guard Endurance, and (Guard) Charge Rate on Sword Kills until stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
刀剑击杀时：
提升刀剑充能效率、防御持久、防御效率、防御抗性。
直到收起刀剑。

descriptions.en:
While within 8 meters of 3 Enemies:
40% Increased Damage that lingers for 1.5 seconds after the condition is no longer met.

Swords only receive a 35% Damage Increase.

Grenade and Rocket Launchers receive a 35% Explosive Damage Increase and a 40% Impact Damage Increase. Wolfpack Rounds receive a 35% Explosive Damage Increase.
descriptions.zh-chs:
8 米范围内有 3 个以上敌人时：
+40% 伤害。
（刀剑 +35% 伤害）

线性持续 1.5 秒。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Collecting Elemental Pickups or destroying Tangles grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge upon reaching 100% Activation Progress.

Activation Progress with 1|2|3 Mods equipped:
• <:solar:720178909361995786>Firesprites,<:void:720178940240461864>Breaches,Tangles: 50%|50%|100%
• <:arc:720178925317128243>Ionic Traces: 34%|50%|50%
• <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Shards: 25%|34%|50%

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Linearly grants up to 30 Handling, -40% Accuracy Cone Size, and -17% Accuracy Cone Growth as health decreases below 156 HP.

Effect reaches maximum strength at Critical Health.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Reduces Incoming AoE Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.
Decreases Ready/Stow Animation Duration by 10%.
descriptions.zh-chs: 获得 0.9x 收枪/拔枪动画系数。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 10 Airborne Effectiveness.

Grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness per stack for 5 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.

Grounded Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack while airborne kills grant 2 Stacks.
descriptions.es:
Mientras la vida esta baja:
Hasta +60 de Eficacia en el Aire

El efecto aumenta linealmente mientras la vida disminuye. Efecto maximo cuando la vida esta en estado critico

Otorga +10 de Eficacia en el Aire de forma pasiva

Mejorado: Otorga hasta +70 de Eficacia en el Aire. Otorga +12 de Eficacia en el Aire de forma pasiva
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用武器完成击杀时：
+30 空中效率，持续 [?] 秒。
该增益最多可叠加两层。空中击杀直接获取两层增益。

被动提升 +10 空中效率

descriptions.en: Restores 67 HP on Class Ability Usage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
闪身时：
恢复 67 生命值。

descriptions.en:
Grants Class Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown after activation.

Class Ability Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>12% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>17% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[8.5%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%]

Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Upon dealing damage with all your weapons within 7 seconds of each:
35% increased damage for 🡅11 seconds.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

After scoring a kill or multiple Precision Hits within 5 seconds of each with a different weapon:
Grants the 'Cascade Point Ready' buff for 5 seconds.

Readying the weapon while Cascade Point Ready is active reduces Firing Delay for 2.5 seconds.

Firing Delay is reduced by 30% on SMGs and Machine Guns and by 40% on other archetypes.

Activation progress on Precision Hits:
• Bows, Linear Fusion/Sniper Rifles, Shotguns: 50%
• Hand Cannons, Sidearms, Scout Rifles: 17.5%
• Auto/Trace/Pulse Rifles, SMGs, Machine Guns: 8%

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Linearly grants the following benefits as the Magazine drops from 50% capacity to empty:
• 🡅15% to 🡅30% Decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• Linearly grants up to 30? Stability

Activation Condition is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.

🡅 Maximum Accuracy Cone Size benefit is increased by an additive 5%. (25%🠚30%)
Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.
Overheat damage is reduced while not aiming down sights.

Spawns a <:special:968793055631114330>Special Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.66% to 1.8%. Average of 57.25 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 3.25x
• Exotic <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 4.75x
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 1.1x

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 27.5%|60%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Ammo Finder Bricks have less variablity compared to Regular Bricks. (i.e. they can't go as far above or under the average ammo amount granted)

1 second after stowing <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.
Maximum Radar Distance is increased by 8 meters.
Grants 10%|13%|15% Ability Energy to the least-charged Ability on Orb of Power pickups.
High damage, high recoil.
Increases Impact Damage by 10%, resulting in a 2.2% total damage increase.
descriptions.zh-chs: 直接命中的冲击伤害 +10%，总伤害等效增加约 2.2%。

descriptions.en:
Upon finishing a reload within 6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
Overflows Magazine from reserves based on the amount of kills scored within 🡅8 seconds of each.

Maxes out at 150% Increased Magazine Capacity. Always rounds magazine up.

Magazine Capacity Increase per Kill:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 20%
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 10%.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed. Allowed time between kills is increased by 1 second.

1 second after stowing <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

While blocking and stationary:
Glaive Projectiles Hits grant 90% Increased Weapon Energy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
保持不动举起护盾时：
远程命中可提供额外 50%(?) 武器能量。

descriptions.en:
Grants <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile Rounds for <:pve:922884406073507930>10 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds upon exiting <:void:720178940240461864>Void Invisibility, making hits with Void Weapons apply <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile.

On Finishers while affected by <:void:720178940240461864>Void Invisibility:
• Grants a 35% Weapon Damage Buff for 6 seconds
• Grants you and allies within 24 meters the Reserve Overshield buff

Reserve Overshield:
• Grants 500% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate
• Consumed on Class Abiliy usage, granting the user a 40 HP <:void:720178940240461864>Void Overshield for 10 seconds

(Letting the timer run out with Echo of Persistence equipped will not grant you <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile Rounds. <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile explosions do not count as damage originating from your weapon.)
descriptions.zh-chs:
在虚空隐身结束后的 <:pve:922884406073507930>6 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] 秒内，获得 <:pve:922884406073507930>35% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] 武器伤害增加。

隐身期间的终结技会在 [?] 米范围内的敌人施加挥发性效果，并使24米范围内的你和盟友获得备用护盾和375%额外的基础职业能力再生速度，直到死亡或使用职业能力。

备用护盾在你施放职业能力时激活，为你提供40 HP的虚空护盾，持续10秒。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

On Precision Kill:
• Target explodes, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>104 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[80] Solar Damage in a 4 meter radius
• Grants 50 Reload Speed for 6 seconds

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准击杀时：
目标将爆炸，在 3 米范围内造成 80 点火元素伤害， 6 秒内 +50 填装速度。

对战斗人员将乘以 1.3 倍的伤害系数，之后再计算战斗人员等级相关的系数。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Weapons of Sorrow: Thorn, Osteo Striga, Touch of Malice, and Necrochasm.

Melee Hits apply Necrotic Poison (Poison for short). Poisoned enemies spread Poison on death in a 5 meter radius.

Kills with the following also spread Poison:
• Thorn's Bullets
• Osteo Striga's Poison Effect
• Touch of Malice's Blight's Poison Effect
• Necrochasm's Poison and Cursed Thrall Explosions

Poison ticks every <:pve:922884406073507930>0.517 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[0.7] seconds for a total of <:pve:922884406073507930>19 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] ticks over <:pve:922884406073507930>9.3 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] seconds. Deals a total of <:pve:922884406073507930>1361 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] damage over the entire duration.

Poison's first tick deals <:pve:922884406073507930>32.35 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5?] damage.

In PvE, the damage of Poison ramps up every tick with the damage increases compounding together:
• 2nd-14th ticks each deal 3.5585 more damage compared to the one before
• 15th tick deals 9.705 more damage than the 14th
• 16th-19th ticks each deal 14.234 more damage than the one before
Weapon Hits grant 10? Handling and 10? Reload Speed for 2 seconds. Stacks 5 times.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a Weapon matching your Subclass Element.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Reduces Incoming <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|30% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with an <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Finishers make enemies within ? meters <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile.

Killing <:void:720178940240461864>Volatile enemies spawns a <:void:720178940240461864>Void Breach.

Killing an enemy while at Critical Health grants a 45 HP <:void:720178940240461864>Void Overshield for 5 seconds (7.5 with <:void:720178940240461864>Echo of Persistence).

8 second cooldown between activations.
Gain increased handling and reload speed when standing near allies. Firing this weapon also grants Wolfpack Rounds to nearby allies wielding non-Exotic Rocket Launchers.

Passively grants:
• 35% Increased Projectile Velocity
• 🡅25 Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier to Rocket Launchers
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier to Glaives and Grenade Launchers

(Reload Duration Multiplier for Bows is unknown)

🡅 Reload Speed Bonus is increased by 5.

While Aiming Down Sights with <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Scoring multiple hits against a target within 3 seconds of each emits 3 damaging shockwaves from its location at the time of activation.

Shockwaves appear 0.285 seconds after scoring enough hits and have a 1 second delay between each pulse.

Each shockwave deals up to <:pve:922884406073507930>120 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[20] damage in a 5? meter radius. Shockwaves deal 25% less damage if activated on [Minor and Elite](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) PvE Combatants.

Shockwaves inherit Weapon Damage Buffs, the weapon's passive Kinetic Damage Bonus in PVE (10% on <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary, 15% on <:special:968793055631114330>Special), and its [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatant-scaling).

The perk cannot be triggered on a target again until after 2? seconds of the last shockwave.

Hits Required for Activation:
• Auto Rifles: Unknown
• Submachine Guns: 14
• Pulse Rifles: 11
• Non-burst Sidearms: 11
• Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 6
• Sniper Rifles: 3

Grants an extra Skip Grenade Charge.

Skip Grenade Drones chase enemies much more aggressively.

Drone hits grant <:pve:922884406073507930>4.2% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.386%] Grenade Ability Energy. (Each drone can hit enemies 2-3 times)

Dealing Melee Damage grants 10 Aim Assist and 10 Range for 10 seconds.

Dealing additional Melee Damage while the Buff is active extends the duration by 10 seconds, up to 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
造成近战伤害会使此武器在 10 秒内 +10 瞄准辅助、+10 射程。

再次造成近战伤害可延长 10 秒持续时间，最高 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Powered Hits grant 3% Increased Damage for 3.5 seconds. Stacks 10 times for a 30% Buff.

Blocking removes all stacks.

Increases <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22%|25% Increased Damage with 1|2|3|4 Mods
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.5%|5.5%|6% Increased Damage

The 4th tier of the damage buff is only obtainable through Artifact Perks and Exotic Armor.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

While Crouched:
• 🡅35 Handling and 🡅25 Stability
• -40% Accuracy Cone Size
• -17% Accuracy Cone Growth
• -80% Horizontal Recoil

Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles.

🡅 Grants 5 more Handling and Stability.
Fires full auto with deeper ammo reserves. Faster reload when weapon is empty.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with with a Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Passively grants 50 Blast Radius.

Rockets attach on impact and detonate after 3 seconds, dealing an additional 25% Explosive Damage.
(Overall 20% increased total damage)

Passively grants 15 Airborne Effectiveness and 50% Additional Base Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Regeneration Rate.

Highlights enemies below 50% HP in a red outline, and Enemy Players with fully-charged Supers in a yellow outline. Highlighting bypasses invisibility.
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提升 +15 空中效率。

以红色轮廓显示低于 50% 生命值的敌人，并以黄色轮廓显示完成超能充能的敌方守护者。
满足这些条件的隐形敌人也会被高亮显示。

+50% 手雷、近战、职业技能充能效率。

descriptions.en:
Void Kills grant Abyssal Extractors for 2.5 seconds.
Maxes out at 20 seconds.

While Abyssal Extractor is active:
300% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate.
200% Additional Base Class and Super Regeneration Rate.

Massively Increases Damage Resist during <:void:720178940240461864>Nova Bomb cast: starts at 99.5% and drops down to 75% near the end.

<:void:720178940240461864>Nova Bomb returns ~5% Super Energy on Kills, up to 50% Super Energy.

While on an <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Subclass:
<:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Ability and <:arc:720178925317128243>Jolt Kills grant Conduction Tines for <:pve:922884406073507930>7 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[4] seconds. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

Conduction Tines 1|2|3 grant the following:
• 167.5%|335%|502.5% additional Base Grenade, Melee, and Super Regeneration Rate
• 22%|44%|66% Decreased Passive Super Drain while <:arc:720178925317128243>Stormtrance is active
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你使用电弧技能或者震颤击杀敌人时，会获得“导电针”<:pve:922884406073507930>7 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[4]秒。

1层“导电针时”
175% 额外基础手雷、近战、超能冷却速率 | 22% 超能消耗速度降低。

2层“导电针时”
350% 额外基础手雷、近战、超能冷却速率 | 44% 超能消耗速度降低。

3层“导电针时”
525% 额外基础手雷、近战、超能冷却速率 | 66% 超能消耗速度降低。

超能消耗速度降低会影响到所有游走型超能，混沌之触除外。

descriptions.en:
Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Instantly reloads your held weapon upon dodging.

Counts as a manual reload an will activate reload-triggered perks such as Kill Clip.

Dodging removes tracking from projectiles fired by PVE combatants and disables the effects of Aim Assist on you for the duration of the animation.

Grants 130% Melee Ability Energy if used within 15 meters of an enemy.
Pellet final blows grant a stacking precision damage and reload speed buff. Precision hits with slugs extend the duration.
Increases Super Energy Gains from Melee Kills based on enemy rank.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

1 second after stowing a Weapon matching your Subclass Element:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.
Multikills with this weapon immediately reload your equipped Kinetic and Energy weapons from reserves.

Grants 35% Flinch Reduction after 🡅0.9 seconds of Aiming Down Sights (ADS) without firing.

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed. The perk remains active while ADS.

🡅 Activation time is reduced by 10%.

While aiming-down-sights at an Enemy:
Rockets track the targeted enemy.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>Diminshed effectiveness in PVP.

Tracking persists for 1 second after not aiming at the enemy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当瞄准敌人时：
火箭可追踪敌人 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP 时追踪效果减弱]

取消瞄准时，追踪效果持续 1 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following benefits for 11 seconds upon reaching Critical Health, or on Ally Death:
• Refills magazine
• ? Range and ? Handling
• Decreases Charge Time by 5%

Grants the following for 7 seconds upon readying the weapon within 7? seconds of scoring a kill with a different weapon:
• 0.75?x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
• 25% Decreased Accuracy Cone Size
• 30 Airborne Effectiveness

Weapon Kills while Discord is active fully refill the Magazine of <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons, and refund 1 Ammo for <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Strand Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Animation Duration cannot be reduced below what it would be at 100 Handling.

While Aiming Down Sights with Strand Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other Flinch Resistance sources.

Grants the following to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier
Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

Hits have a chance to activate Veist Stinger for 7 seconds, granting the following bonuses:
• Refills 25% of Magazine from reserves on activation
• Reduces ADS Movement Speed Penalty by an additive 5%
• Grants 15% Decreased Draw Time to Bows
• Grants ? Charge Rate to Swords

4 second cooldown between activations.

Activation Chance on hits:
• Auto Rifle, Submachine Gun: 2%
• Sidearm: 4%
• Bow, Linear Fusion Rifle, Sniper Rifle: 10%
