descriptions.zh-chs:
VEIST 尖刺：
• 使用备弹重新填装弹匣，4 秒冷却时间。
• 弓箭 -15% 蓄力时间，持续 6 秒。
• 刀剑加快 [15?]% 充能效率，持续 6 秒。

触发概率：
自动步枪、冲锋枪： 2%
收枪： 4%
弓箭、线性融合步枪： 10%

descriptions.en:
On Guardian Kills while below 63 HP:
Grants an Enhanced Radar and removes you from passively appearing on opposing radar for 10 seconds.

Firing weapons still pings enemy radar once per shot.
descriptions.zh-chs:
低于 63 点生命值时，守护者使用此武器造成最后一击：
在 10 秒内提供强化雷达，并将你从敌方雷达上移除。

descriptions.en:
Upon scoring multiple hits within 6 seconds of each:
• Grants 40% Increased Damage against [Constructs and Vehicles](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants) for 5 seconds
• Refills 10% of the Magazine from thin air

Hits against Constructs are not be able to trigger the perk but they contribute to its activation progress.
All Armor Charge sources grant an additional Stack.

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Finishers consume 3 Stacks of Armor Charge and generate a Special Ammo Brick for you and allies.

Finisher consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant Melee Ability Energy.

Energy Gains with 3|4|5|6 Stacks Consumed:
70% | 80% | 90% | 100%

Finishers consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant a 45 HP <:void:720178940240461864>Void Overshield.

Overshield lasts 8|10|12|14 seconds with 3|4|5|6 Stacks of Armor Charge consumed.

<:void:720178940240461864>Echo of Persistence increases Duration by 50%.
Finishers consume 1 Stack of Armor Charge to fully restore Health and Shields.
Finishers consume 1 Stack of Armor Charge and refill all your weapons from reserves.

Finisher consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant Grenade Ability Energy.

Energy Gains with 3|4|5|6 Stacks Consumed:
70% | 80% | 90% | 100%

Upon finishing a reload, for 6 seconds:
Grants 40 Handling and 20% Flinch Resistance.

Cannot be refreshed. Persists while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成填装时：
在 6 秒内为此武器提供额外 40 操控性、 20% 后仰抖动抗性。

持续时间无法被刷新。收起武器时仍然有效。

descriptions.en: Landing a final blow or multiple precision hits triggers a burst that poisons nearby targets.

Class Ability Usage applies Misdirection to enemies within 22 meters.

Misdirection:
• Deals ~0 Damage but counts as a Hit
• <:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: Disorients Minors and Elites for 5 seconds
• <:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: Muffles audio, briefly disorients, and removes radar for 5 seconds
descriptions.zh-chs:
躲闪时：
向 22 米范围内的敌人施加迷惑。

迷惑的效果：
• [PVE] 使普通和精英敌人混乱5秒。
• [PVP] 扭曲声音并在 5 秒内移除雷达，并短暂致盲。

迷惑不会造成伤害。

descriptions.en:
After dealing Non-Precision Weapon Damage:
• Increases Precision Multiplier by 0.1175
• (?) Aim Assist

Buff lasts 0.55 seconds. Dealing additional Non-Precision Damage refreshes the timer.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Grants 30|50|60 Mobility with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Orbs of Power grant an additional 2% Super Energy.

Picking up an Orb of Power with a charged Super Ability grants an Overcharge Stack. Maximum of 4 Stacks, consumed on Super cast.

Casting your Super while at 1|2|3|4 Stacks consumes all stack and grants the following benefits:
• 27.3%|54.6%|62.3%|70% Increased Super Damage
• Restores 125|170|190|200 HP
• 100 HP Overshield for 16 seconds if Cast at 4 Stacks

After Damaging 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each: 35% Increased Damage for 10 seconds.

Buff duration cannot be refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
3 秒内命中 3 个不同目标：
+35% 伤害，持续 10 秒。

该增益无法被刷新。

descriptions.en: When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Grants 1|2 Stacks while within 15 meters of 1|2+ enemies.

Bonuses at 1|2 Stacks:
• 15|40 Stability
• 18|60 Reload Speed
• 25|100 Handling
• 0.9x|0.81x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米内有 1 个敌人时：
~15 稳定性、15 装填速度、0.75x 操作动画系数。

15 米内有 2 个以上敌人时：
~40 稳定性、55 装填速度、0.56x 操作动画系数。

descriptions.en: Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.
Grants a 200 HP Overshield for the duration of your Finisher Animation.

Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack of Swashbuckler for 4.5 seconds. Melee kills grant all 5 stacks. Buff duration is refreshed on Weapon or Melee Kills.

Damage Increase at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3%
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器或近战击杀：
提升 6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3% 伤害，持续 4.5 秒。

击杀可刷新持续时间，近战击杀直接获得 5 层增益效果。

descriptions.en:
Gain 1 Ammo after scoring 3 Powered Hits within 2(?) seconds of each.

🡅 Allowed time between Hits is increased.

Restores 70 HP on Orb of Power Pickups.

Equipping multiple copies provides no benefit.
Grants 7.77% Increased Damage against [Minor Combatants](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants).
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对普通敌人的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Grants 20 Handling, 40 Reload Speed, and a 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier while out of Combat. Swords receive up to a 25% Increase to Movement Speed instead.

For One Quiet Moment, being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 5 seconds. Kills reduce this to 1.5 seconds until damage is dealt or received.

Can activate even if stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs: 脱离战斗时获得 40 装填速度。

descriptions.en:
Replaces Grenade Ability with 'Cage of Loyal Moths', grants an extra Grenade Ability Charge. Overrides Base (T3) Grenade Ability cooldown to 73 seconds.

Moth Cage explodes on impact, releasing 2 loyal moths that fly to their nearest target.

Loyal Moths variants:
• <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Moths: slower-flying, offensive role. They seek out targets and detonate on contact, dealing up to <:pve:922884406073507930>526 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[31 to Players, 201 to Objects] damage over a 4 meter radius and <:arc:720178925317128243>Blinding targets. Counts as <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Grenade Damage.
• <:void:720178940240461864>Void Moths: faster-flying, support role. They seek out allies and grant them a 22.5 HP <:void:720178940240461864>Void Overshield on contact.

When no enemies are within ? meters of the detonation area, it spawns 2 Void Moths. When only enemies are around, it spawns 2 Arc Moths.

When both allies and enemies are around, it spawns 1 Arc Moth and 1 Void Moth.

Upon missing multiple times within 2.5 seconds of each without scoring a hit:
Grants +25? Stability for 2.5? seconds.

Misses in a row required:
• Auto Rifle: 10
• Hand Cannon: 4
• Linear Fusion Rifle, Pulse Rifle: unknown

Buff is removed 1? second after scoring a hit.

🡅 Deactivation time after scoring a hit is increased.

If charged, Melee Hits instantly cast Smoke Bomb.

Smoke Bombs deal 50% Increased Damage. <:void:720178940240461864>Quickfall does not receive this Damage Increase.

Dealing damage with Smoke Bomb grants Truesight for 3 seconds, allowing you to see enemy outlines through walls from up to 64 meters away.

Grants 500% Additional Base Melee Recharge Rate while a Smoke Bomb is active.

<:void:720178940240461864>Void Invisiblity prevents the Ability Recharge bonus from applying.

After being in Combat for 12 seconds:
Grants 15% Increased Damage, 100 Handling, and 100 Reload Speed for 7 seconds.

Works and can activate while stowed. Dealing and receiving damage refreshes the buff duration.

For Frenzy, being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
持续处于 战斗状态 12 秒后：
+15% 伤害， +50 操控性，+50 填装速度。

持续到脱离战斗，收枪状态也会触发。

战斗状态的定义为：造成或受到伤害 5 秒内。

descriptions.en: Targets killed with Sunshot explode in Solar energy.

Passively decreases the ADS Animation Duration:
• 50% Decrease on <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons
• 20% Decrease on <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Grappling grants Woven Mail.

Grants ?% Flinch Resistance while Woven Mail is active.

Passively grants 30 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier.

Decreases Magazine Size Stat by 30. (Functional equivalent of an "inverse of Extended Mag")
descriptions.zh-chs:
+30 填装速度，-10% 装填动画持续时间。

-20 弹匣容量。

descriptions.en: Improved weapon performance and greatly increased recovery when its wielder is the last living member of a fireteam.

The next Weapon Kill within 10 seconds of using your Class Ability spawns an Orb of Power that grants 0.8% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.

Equipping multiple copies of the mod provides no benefit.

Taking 20 Damage grants a Stack of Bitterspite. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Reload Buff at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 10 | 20 | 30 | 40 | 50 Reload Speed Stat
• 0.97x | 0.96x | 0.95x | 0.92x | 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs:
受到 [20?] 伤害可获得一层苦涩怨恨，最多叠加 5 次。

增加的装填速度与苦涩怨恨叠加的层数相关，当重新装填或收起武器后将失效。

descriptions.en:
Class Ability usage grants Melee Energy.

Melee Energy Gains with 1|2|3 Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>12% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>17% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[8.5%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%]

Energy Multipliers based on Class:
Hunters: x1 | Titans: x1.2 | Warlocks: x2
Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy uppercut attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

On Super Ability Activation:
• Fully restores Health, Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy
• Grants <:solar:720178909361995786>Cure x3 to Allies within ? meters

Grants 66% Grenade and Melee Ability Energy for 8 seconds once your Super ends.
descriptions.zh-chs:
24 米范围内的队友获得额外 25% 的基础职业技能恢复速度。

在施放超能时：
完全恢复生命值，以及手雷、近战、职业技能的能量。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Pellet Spread by 🡅25% on Weapon Kills for a single shot within the next 8 seconds.

🡅 Further Reduces Pellet Spread.
Grenade Kills grant <:solar:720178909361995786>Cure x1.

<:solar:720178909361995786>Firesprite pickups grant <:solar:720178909361995786>Restoration x1 for 2 seconds. (Overrides the duration of any active <:solar:720178909361995786>Restoration effects)

Reviving allies grants you and allies within ? meters <:solar:720178909361995786>Restoration x1 for 5 seconds.

When a Grenade Ability Charge is fully consumed and you have active Armor Charges:
Consumes active Armor Charges and grants Grenade Ability Energy.

Each Mod and Stack of Armor Charge counts as one 'charge' for Grenade Energy refunds.

Grenade Energy gains with 2|3|etc. 'charges':
<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 16.2% | 21.7% | 28.4% | 34.4% | 38.4% | 41.3% | 43.4% | 45%
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 12.5% | 14.2% | 16.2% | 18.7% | 21.7% | 25% | 28.4% | 31.6%

Swords are refunded 1 Ammo after every other Powered Kill.

🡅 ?% Chance to be refunded 1 more Ammo.

Sentinel Shield's Forward Movement Speed Penalty while Blocking is reduced to 10%.

Converts incoming damage into Super Energy after Super ends, up to 50% Super Energy.

Blocking Damage with an active Overshield does not count towards the Super Energy Refund.
This weapon fires [Stagger] staggering projectiles. Strong against Unstoppable Champions.

While Aiming-Down-Sights:
• Increased Body Shot Damage
• 🡅-15%? Auto Aim Cone Size (No effect on Magnetism AKA reticle stickiness)

Body Shot Damage Increases:
• Auto/Scout Rifle, Bow, Hand Cannon: 20%
• Pulse/Trace Rifle, Sidearm, SMG: 10%

🡅 Reduces Auto Aim penalty by an additive 5%?.

On Weapon Kill, for 🡅5.5 seconds:
• 50 Mobility
• 40 Handling and 20 Range
• 5% Increased Damage Falloff Distance

Additional Kills extend the duration by 5 seconds, up to 8 seconds.

🡅 Initial Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Powered Melee Kills Grant Unraveling Rounds to your Strand Weapons for <:pve:922884406073507930>8 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5] seconds.
Threadlings travel 30?% faster and farther and deal <:pve:922884406073507930>33% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Increased Damage.

Using your Grenade Ability refills your readied weapon from reserves and grants the following stat bonuses for 15 seconds:
• 30? Handling
• 40 Reload Speed
• 0.925x Reload Duration Multiplier
• 30 Airborne Effectiveness

4 second cooldown between Magazine Refills.
Finishing a PVE Combatant spawns a Threadling.

Killing Suspensded enemies grants Class Ability Energy based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 10%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 12%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites, Players: 15%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 30%

1? second cooldown between activations.

Dealing damage with Tangles grants Melee Energy per damage instance based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Tier 1 (T1) Minors: 10%
• T2 Minors, T1 Elites: 18%
• T3 Minors, T2 Elites: 20%
• Players: 25%
• T4 Minors, T3 Elites, and higher: 25%

Scoring Strand Weapon Kills spawns Threadlings upon reaching 100% Activation Progress.

Activation Progress gained and Threadling Count vary based on [Enemy Rank](https://url.d2clarity.com/combatants):
• Minors: 34% Activation Progress | 1 Threadling
• Elites: 67% | 2
• Minibosses and Bosses: 100% | 3

Weapon Kills while you have Woven Mail spawn a Tangle at the target's location.

Shares the 12 second global Tangle creation cooldown.
Orb of Power Pickups grant Woven Mail for 10 seconds.

Killing Suspended enemies spawns an Orb of Power that grants 2.5% Super Energy.

10 second cooldown between activations.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Fusion Rifles and Linear Fusion Rifles.

Fusion Rifle and Linear Fusion Rifle kills grant Radiant for 7.5 seconds.

Air Dodges refill all weapons from reserves. Air Dodges include <:solar:720178909361995786>Icarus Dash and Weavewalk.

Finishing a reload within 5.3? seconds of a Kill grants <:solar:720178909361995786>Cure x1 for you and allies within ? meters.

🡅 Allowed time before reloading is increased.

Thundercrash deals 100% increased damage.

On Thundercrash Deactivation:
Grants a 100 HP Overshield for 7 seconds.
Overshield duration scales with Thundercrash distance, up to 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
雷霆冲击提升 100% 伤害。

当雷霆冲击释放完成时：
在 7 秒内获得 100 生命值的覆盖护盾。
覆盖护盾持续时间会根据雷霆冲击释放距离而延长，最高为 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Strand Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Refills 🡅20% of the Magazine from reserves on Weapon Kills.

🡅 Refill amount is increased by an additive 10%. (3% on Submachine Guns and Auto Rifles)

Reduces <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Staff's Passive Super Drain by 30%.

Can deactivate <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Staff at any time to preserve ?% of unused Super Energy.

On Arc Staff deactivation:
Blinds enemies within ? meters and grants 4 Stacks of <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapon Surge for <:pve:922884406073507930>21 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[16] seconds.

Kills refill the magazine while Last Guardian Standing.
Does not activate when playing solo.

Passively grants 30 Magazine stat. (Identical to Extended Mag)
descriptions.zh-chs:
如果你是火力战队中唯一生还的成员：
每次最后一击都会刷新弹匣。

被动提升 +30 弹夹容量。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within ? seconds of each with a <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|4.4% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat combatants while using this weapon in Arc, Solar, and Void modes to unlock this upgrade.

Defeating combatants in the Throne World, PsiOps Battlegrounds, or the "Vox Obscura" Exotic quest will unlock these objectives faster. Defeating Champions provides bonus progress to all 3 objectives.

Multiple Weapon Kills within ? seconds of each spawn a Dawning Gift that remais on the ground for 10 seconds.

Picking up Dawning Gifts grants 10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy, restores 20 HP, and starts Health Regeneration.

Activation progress on Kills by Enemy Rank:
• Minors and Guardians: 16.66%
• Majors and Bosses: 50%

Weapon fires Full Auto. (Identical to the setting)

Grants 10% Faster Rate of Fire on Shotguns.
descriptions.zh-chs:
扣住扳机时将以全自动模式进行射击。

使用霰弹枪时会提高 10% 射速。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Taking any Damage while Guarding increases Lunge Distance by 80% for 1 second.
Deactivates after 1 swing.

Guarding while being shot at by or receiving Healing Effects (inlcuding the Restoration Buff) from allies also activates the perk currently.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

Taking any Damage while Guarding increases Lunge Distance by 80% for 1 second.
Deactivates after 1 swing.

Guarding while being shot at by or receiving Healing Effects (inlcuding the Restoration Buff) from allies also activates the perk currently.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Grants 20|40|50 Inventory Size Stat to Strand Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by both the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Increases Damage by 15% for 7 seconds on Weapon Kills.

Matching Grenade or Powered Melee Kills while the buff is active grant 50% Increased Damage for 10 seconds.

The 50% Damage Buff's duration can only be refreshed by getting another Matching Ability Kill.

🡅 The 15% Damage Buff is refreshed to 8 seconds if a weapon kill is made while it is active.

Applies 30 <:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch Stacks (40 with <:solar:720178909361995786>Ember of Ashes) and deals up to ? damage to enemies within 4? meters of the target on Weapon Kills.

Killing Powerful Combatants and Players increases the radius to 8 meters.

<:solar:720178909361995786>Scorch damage can be increased through [Weapon Damage Buffs](https://url.d2clarity.com/DamageBuffs).
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
对 [?] 米范围内的敌人造成 30 层灼烧效果。
骨灰余烬会将灼烧效果增加到 40 层。

击杀强大的战斗人员或敌方守护者可将范围增加到 8 米。

灼烧伤害可以因武器特性、敌人负面效果、战斗人员阶级而增加。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.
